  54 -def draw_square(cr, x, y, fill=True): 

  55      """Dessine un carré jaune à fond blanc, x et y en pixels (device)""" 
  56      #print "_draw_square" 
  57      cr.save() 
  58      # antialiasing utile si les coordonnées ne sont pas des entiers 
  59      cr.set_antialias(cairo.ANTIALIAS_NONE) 
  60      size = 4 
  61      cr.rectangle(x-size, y-size, 2*size, 2*size) 
  62      cr.fill() 
  63      cr.stroke() 
  64      size = 3 
  65      if not fill: 
  66        cr.restore() 
  67        return 
  68      cr.set_source_rgb(1, 1, 1) 
  69      cr.rectangle(x-size, y-size, 2*size, 2*size) 
  70      cr.fill() 
  71      cr.stroke() 
  72      cr.restore() 

  73

  75 -def draw_single_soll_text(cr, x, y, text, angle=0, font_size=1, bold=False): 

  76      """Ecrit une valeur caractéristique sur un diagramme de sollicitation 
  77      pt est donné en coordonnées device 
  78      pos : 0 : angle supérieur gauche 
  79      """ 
  80      cr.save() 
  81      #print cr.font_extents() 
  82      cr.set_font_size(Const.FONT_SIZE*font_size) 
  83      #if bold: 
  84      #  cr.select_font_face(Const.FONT, 
  85      #            cairo.FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, cairo.FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD) 
  86      x_bearing, y_bearing, width, height = cr.text_extents(text)[:4] 
  87      #cr.arc(x, y, 3, 0, 6.29) 
  88      #cr.fill() 
  89      #cr.stroke() 
  90      cr.move_to(x, y) 
  91      cr.rotate(angle) 
  92      cr.rel_move_to( - width / 2 - x_bearing, - height / 2 - y_bearing) 
  93      #print cr.user_to_device(x, y) 
  94      cr.show_text(text) 
  95      cr.restore()

  97 -def get_influ_conv(status, unit_conv): 

  98    """Retourne le facteur de conversion pour les lignes d'influences""" 
  99    if status == 2: 
 100      return unit_conv['F']*unit_conv['L'] 
 101    elif status == 3: 
 102      return unit_conv['L'] 
 103    return unit_conv['F']

 105 -class Singleton(object): 

 106 -  def __new__(cls, *args, **kwargs): 

 107      if '_inst' not in vars(cls): 
 108        cls._inst = object.__new__(cls, *args, **kwargs) 
 109      return cls._inst

 124 -class FGColor(Singleton): 

 125    """Classe pour la gestion des couleurs""" 
 126   

 127 -  def __init__(self): 

 128      self._configure_colors() 

 129   

 130 -  def _configure_colors(self): 

 131      """Définit les couleurs du drawing_area 
 132      Les couleurs sont placées dans la propriété diColor""" 
 133      # pixmap colors 
 134      colormap = gtk.gdk.colormap_get_system()  
 135      color = colormap.alloc_color("white", writeable=False, best_match=True) 
 136      self._white = color 
 137      # cairo colors 
 138      self._colors = {'red': (1, 0, 0), 
 139                  'blue': (0, 0, 1), 
 140                  'grey': (0.4, 0.4, 0.4), 
 141                  'white': (1, 1, 1), 
 142                  'orange': (0.8, 0.8, 0.2), 
 143                  'black': (0, 0, 0), 
 144                  'green': (0, 1, 0)} 

 145   

 146 -  def get_nth_color(self, i): 

 147      """Retourne la couleur de rang i""" 
 148      colors = self._colors.keys() 
 149      colors.remove('white') 
 150      n = len(colors) 
 151      return colors[i % n] 

 152   

 153 -  def set_nth_color(self, cr, i): # inutilisée 

 154      """Retourne la couleur de rang i""" 
 155      colors = self._colors.keys() 
 156      n = len(colors) 
 157      color = self._colors[colors[i % n]] 
 158      cr.set_source_rgb(color[0], color[1], color[2]) 

 159   

 160 -  def set_color_by_name(self, cr, color, alpha=1.): 

 161      try: 
 162        color = self._colors[color] 
 163      except KeyError: 
 164        print "FGColor color name error" 
 165        return 
 166      cr.set_source_rgba(color[0], color[1], color[2], alpha)

 180      self.disc = disc 
 181      self.auto = auto # valeur automatique ou user

 183 -  def get_position(self): 

 184      """Retourne la position de la légende"""

 187 -  def get_is_selected(self, x_event, y_event, m): 

 188      x, y = self.x, self.y 
 189      if x_event < x-m or x_event > x + m: 
 190        return False 
 191      if y_event < y-m or y_event > y + m: 
 192        return False 
 193      return True

 200 -  def __init__(self, u, name, tu): 

 201      text, x, y, a, disc = tu 
 202      Value.__init__(self)

 204      self.u = u # 0, 1, 2 
 205      self.name = name 
 206      self.x = x

 209   

 210 -  def get_reac_text(self, rdm, unit_conv, unit_name, Char, drawing): 

 211      """Met en évidence une réaction d'appui""" 
 212      barre = self.name 
 213      if drawing.parent is None: 
 214        is_child = False 
 215        texts = ['Fx', 'Fy', 'M'] 
 216      else: 
 217        is_child = True 
 218        texts = ['N', 'V', 'M'] 
 219      if is_child and drawing.N1[2] == barre: 
 220        pos = 0 
 221      else: 
 222        pos = 1 
 223      Char = rdm.GetCharByNumber(drawing.s_case) 
 224      if self.u == 0: 
 225        if is_child: 
 226          val = Char.EndBarSol[drawing.s_bar][pos][0] 
 227        else: 
 228          val = Char.Reactions[barre]["Fx"] # barre est ici un noeud!! 
 229      elif self.u == 1: 
 230        if is_child: 
 231          val = Char.EndBarSol[drawing.s_bar][pos][1] 
 232        else: 
 233          val = Char.Reactions[barre]["Fy"] # barre est ici un noeud!! 
 234      else: 
 235        if is_child: 
 236          val = Char.EndBarSol[drawing.s_bar][pos][2] 
 237        else: 
 238          val = Char.Reactions[barre]["Mz"] # barre est ici un noeud!! 
 239      val = val/unit_conv 
 240      legend = '%s = %f %s' % (texts[self.u], val, unit_name) 
 241      return legend

 247 -  def __init__(self, u, name, tu): 

 248      values, x, y, a, disc, auto = tu 
 249      Value.__init__(self, disc, auto) 
 250      self.values = values 
 251      assert len(values) == 2 
 252      # u : longueur absolue 
 253      self.u = float(u) # convertit type 'numpy.float64' 
 254      self.name = name 
 255      self.x = x 
 256      self.y = y 
 257      self.a = a 

 258   

 259 -  def get_soll_text(self, rdm, unit_conv, unit_name): 

 260      """Met en évidence une légende""" 
 261      u, barre = self.u, self.name 
 262      l = rdm.struct.Lengths[barre] 
 263      if u == 0 or u == l: 
 264        is_node = True 
 265        if u == 0: 
 266          node = rdm.struct.Barres[barre][0] 
 267        else: 
 268          node = rdm.struct.Barres[barre][1] 
 269      else: 
 270        is_node = False 
 271      if is_node: 
 272        legend = "sur %s: %s" % (barre, node) 
 273      else: 
 274        u = function.PrintValue(u, unit_conv, True) 
 275        legend = "sur %s: %s %s" % (barre, u, unit_name) 
 276      return legend

 286      self.values = values 
 287      assert len(values) == 2 
 288      self.u = float(u) # longueur absolu par rapport origine arc 
 289      self.name = name 
 290      self.x = x

 294 -  def get_soll_text(self, rdm, unit_conv, unit_name): 

 295      """Met en évidence une légende""" 
 296      struct = rdm.struct 
 297      Lengths = struct.Lengths 
 298      Arc = struct.Curves[self.name] 
 299      ltot = Arc.get_size(Lengths) 
 300   
 301      user_nodes = Arc.user_nodes 
 302      N0, N1 = user_nodes[0].name, user_nodes[-1].name 
 303      if self.u == 0: 
 304        legend = "sur %s: %s" % (self.name, N0) 
 305      elif self.u == ltot: 
 306        legend = "sur %s: %s" % (self.name, N1) 
 307      else: 
 308        pos = function.PrintValue(self.u, unit_conv, True) 
 309        legend = "Position sur %s: %s %s" % (self.name, pos, unit_name) 
 310      return legend

 357 -class MParabola(object): 

 358    """Classes contenant une parabole pour le mapping""" 
 359   
 360  # simplifier : ldefo, dx ... 

 361 -  def __init__(self, name, coors): 

 362      self.name = name 
 363      self.coors = coors 

 364   

 365 -  def get_is_selected(self, x_event, y_event, m): 

 366      pt, coefs, geom, bezier = self.coors 
 367      a, b = coefs[1:3] 
 368      x, dx, x1, dx1, angle = geom 
 369      l = x1+dx1 
 370      x0, y0 = pt # origine de la barre 
 371      x_e = (x_event-x0)*math.cos(angle)-(y_event-y0)*math.sin(angle) 
 372      y_e = -(x_event-x0)*math.sin(angle)-(y_event-y0)*math.cos(angle) # inversion signe 
 373      if x_e < x+dx or x_e > x+dx+l: 
 374        return False 
 375      y_chart = a*x_e**2+b*x_e 
 376      if abs(y_chart-y_e) < m: 
 377        return True 
 378      return False 

 379   

 380 -  def redraw(self, cr): 

 381      """Redessine l'arc à partir des données du mapping""" 
 382      x0, y0 = self.coors[0] 
 383      cr.move_to(x0, y0) 
 384      c1x, c1y, c2x, c2y, x1, y1 = self.coors[3] 
 385      cr.rel_curve_to(c1x, c1y, c2x, c2y, x1, y1) 
 386      cr.stroke() 
 387      draw_square(cr, x0, y0) 
 388      draw_square(cr, x0+x1, y0+y1) 

 389   

 390 -class MArc(object): 

 391    """Classes contenant un arc pour le mapping""" 

 392 -  def __init__(self, name, coors): 

 393      self.name = name 
 394      self.coors = coors 

 395   

 396 -  def get_is_selected(self, x, y, m): 

 397      """Retourne False or True si l'arc est mappé""" 
 398      xc, yc, r, teta1, teta2 = self.coors 
 399      d = ((x-xc)**2 + (y-yc)**2)**0.5 
 400      if abs(d-r) > m: 
 401        return False 
 402      if teta1 == teta2: 
 403        if abs(d-r) < m: 
 404          return True 
 405      a = function.get_vector_angle((xc, -yc), (x, -y)) 
 406      if teta1 <= 0 and teta2 > 0: 
 407        if a > teta2 or a < teta2: 
 408          return True 
 409      else: 
 410        if teta2 < a and a < teta1: 
 411          return True 
 412      return False 

 413   

 414 -  def redraw(self, cr): 

 415      """Redessine l'arc à partir des données du mapping""" 
 416      xc, yc, r, teta1, teta2 = self.coors 
 417      if teta1 == teta2: 
 418        cr.arc(xc, yc, r, 0, 6.29) 
 419      else: 
 420        cr.arc(xc, yc, r, -teta1, -teta2) 
 421      cr.stroke() 
 422      draw_square(cr, xc, yc)

 446 -  def __init__(self, tu): 

 447      self.pt0, self.pt1, pos = tu 
 448      self.l = ((self.pt1[0]-self.pt0[0])**2+(self.pt1[1]-self.pt0[1])**2)**0.5

 451 -  def get_is_selected(self, x_event, y_event, m): 

 452      #print "get_is_selected",  x_event, y_event, m 
 453      pt0, pt1 = self.pt0, self.pt1 
 454      x0, y0 = pt0 
 455      x1, y1 = pt1 
 456      if x1 < x0: 
 457        x0, x1 = x1, x0 
 458        y0, y1 = y1, y0 
 459      dx, dy = x1-x0, y1-y0 
 460      if x_event < x0-1 or x_event > x1+1: 
 461        return False 
 462   
 463      #if abs(dx) < 1: # courbe verticale 
 464      #  if y0 < y1: 
 465      #    if y_event > y0 and y_event < y1: 
 466      #      self.is_selected = (x0, y_event, None) 
 467      #      return True 
 468      #  else: 
 469      #    if y_event > y1 and y_event < y0: 
 470      #      self.is_selected = (x0, y_event, None) 
 471      #      return True 
 472      #  return False 
 473      if dx > abs(dy): 
 474        y = dy * (x_event-x0) / dx + y0 
 475        d = abs(y_event-y) 
 476        if d < m: 
 477          self.is_selected = (x_event, y, None) 
 478          return True 
 479      else: 
 480        x = dx * (y_event-y0) / dy + x0 
 481        d = abs(x_event-x) 
 482        if d < m: 
 483          self.is_selected = (x, y_event, None) 
 484          return True 
 485      return False

 489 -  def redraw(self, cr): 

 490      x, y = self.pt1

 493 -  def push_hover_value(self, cr, study, barre, drawing, n_case): 

 494      x, y, u = self.is_selected # en px absolu, u = None 
 495      u0, u1 = self.u0, self.u1 
 496      x0, y0 = self.pt0 # origine de la barre 
 497      dl = ((x-x0)**2+(y-y0)**2)**0.5 
 498      u = u0 + dl/self.l*(self.u1-self.u0) 
 499      if u > self.u1: 
 500        u = self.u1 
 501      if u < self.u0: 
 502        u = self.u0 
 503      self.is_selected = (x, y, u) 
 504      angle = function.get_vector_angle(self.pt0, self.pt1) 
 505      if drawing.status == 7: 
 506        rdm = study.rdm 
 507        unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
 508        Char = rdm.GetCharByNumber(n_case) 
 509        val = rdm.GetValue(barre, u, Char, drawing.status) 
 510        valx, valy = val 
 511        text = function.PrintValue(valy, unit_conv['L']) 
 512      elif drawing.status == 8: 
 513        rdm = study.influ_rdm 
 514        unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
 515        i_obj = drawing.influ_list[n_case] 
 516        l = rdm.struct.Lengths[barre] 
 517        val = rdm.ValueLigneInf(barre, u/l, i_obj.elem, i_obj.u, i_obj.status) 
 518        influ_unit = get_influ_conv(i_obj.status, unit_conv) 
 519        text = function.PrintValue(val, influ_unit) 
 520        val = (0., val) # provisoire 
 521      elif drawing.status == 6: 
 522        rdm = study.rdm 
 523        unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
 524        Char = rdm.GetCharByNumber(n_case) 
 525        val = rdm.GetValue(barre, u, Char, drawing.status) 
 526        valx, valy = val 
 527        text = function.PrintValue(valy, unit_conv['F']*unit_conv['L']) 
 528      else: 
 529        rdm = study.rdm 
 530        unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
 531        Char = rdm.GetCharByNumber(n_case) 
 532        val = rdm.GetValue(barre, u, Char, drawing.status) 
 533        valx, valy = val 
 534        text = function.PrintValue(valy, unit_conv['F']) 
 535      self.text = text 
 536      cr.push_group() 
 537      color = drawing._fg.get_nth_color(n_case) 
 538      drawing._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
 539      cr.save() 
 540      cr.set_font_size(Const.FONT_SIZE) 
 541      cr.move_to(x, y-10) 
 542      cr.rotate(angle) 
 543      cr.show_text("%s" % text) 
 544      cr.restore() 
 545      drawing._draw_legend_position(cr, rdm.struct, barre, u, val) 
 546      drawing.p_window = cr.pop_group() 

 547   

 548 -class MCurveArc(object): 

 549    """segment de Bezier du tracé""" 
 550   

 551 -  def __init__(self, elem): 

 552      self.x0 = elem[0] 
 553      self.y0 = elem[1] 
 554      self.c0x = elem[2] 
 555      self.c0y = elem[3] 
 556      self.c1x = elem[4] 
 557      self.c1y = elem[5] 
 558      self.x1 = elem[6] 
 559      self.y1 = elem[7] 
 560      self.b0 = elem[8] 
 561      self.b1 = elem[9] 

 562      #print "init=", self.b0, self.b1 
 563   
 564  # meme methode que pout les segments 

 565 -  def get_is_selected(self, x_event, y_event, m): 

 566      #pt0, pt1 = self.pt0, self.pt1 
 567      x0, y0 = self.x0, self.y0 
 568      x1, y1 = self.x1, self.y1 
 569      if x1 < x0: 
 570        x0, x1 = x1, x0 
 571        y0, y1 = y1, y0 
 572      dx, dy = x1-x0, y1-y0 
 573      if x_event < x0 or x_event > x1: 
 574        return False 
 575      y = dy * (x_event-x0) / dx + y0 
 576      d = abs(y_event-y) 
 577      if d < m: 
 578        l0 = (dx**2+dy**2)**0.5 
 579        l = ((x_event-x0)**2+(y-y0)**2)**0.5 
 580        pos = l/l0 
 581        n = self.b1 - self.b0 + 1 
 582        db = int(n*pos) 
 583        b = self.b0 + db 
 584        pos1 = pos*n-db # position sur la barre en relatif 
 585        self.is_selected = (pos1, b, None) # pos1 : par rapport début barre, pos : début arc 
 586        return True 
 587      return False 

 588   

 589 -  def push_hover_value(self, cr, study, arc, drawing, n_case): 

 590      rdm = study.rdm 
 591      struct = rdm.struct 
 592      #unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
 593      Char = rdm.GetCharByNumber(n_case) 
 594      status = drawing.status 
 595      pos1, b, pos = self.is_selected 
 596      node0 = struct.Barres[b][0] 
 597      angle = struct.Angles[b] 
 598      val, text = rdm.GetArcValue(Char, status, b, pos1) 
 599      #print "val=", val 
 600      x0, y0 = struct.Nodes[node0] 
 601      X0, Y0 = drawing.x0, drawing.y0 
 602      struct_scale = drawing.struct_scale*drawing.struct_zoom 
 603      chart_scale = drawing.chart_scale*drawing.chart_zoom 
 604      l = struct.Lengths[b] 
 605      cr.push_group() 
 606      #print cr.get_matrix() 
 607      drawing._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, "red") 
 608      cr.save() 
 609      cr.translate(X0 + x0*struct_scale, Y0 - y0*struct_scale) 
 610      cr.rotate(-angle) 
 611      dv = -val[1]*chart_scale 
 612   
 613      color = drawing._fg.get_nth_color(n_case) 
 614      drawing._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color)

 637 -  def get_is_selected(self, x_event, y_event, m): 

 638      u, dx, x1, dx1, angle = self.geom 
 639      ldefo = x1+dx1 
 640      x0, y0 = self.pt0 # origine de la barre en px 
 641      x_e = (x_event-x0)*math.cos(angle)+(y_event-y0)*math.sin(angle) 
 642      y_e = (x_event-x0)*math.sin(angle)-(y_event-y0)*math.cos(angle) # dans le rep de la barre en px 
 643      if x_e < u+dx or x_e > u+dx+ldefo: 
 644        return False 
 645      y_chart = self.f(x_e-dx, self.coefs) 
 646      if abs(y_chart-y_e) < m: 
 647        x, y = function.Rotation(angle, x_e, y_chart) 
 648        x, y = x+x0, y0-y # repère global en px 
 649        self.is_selected = (x, y, x_e) 
 650        return True 
 651      return False

 707   

 708 -  def f(self, x, coefs): 

 709        """La fonction polynomiale""" 
 710        rank = len(coefs) 
 711        y = 0 
 712        for c in coefs: 
 713          y += c*x**(rank-1) 
 714          rank -= 1 
 715        return y 

 716   

 717 -  def redraw(self, cr): 

 718      c1x, c1y, c2x, c2y, x, y = self.bezier

 721 -class Barre(object): 

 722    """Classes contenant une barre pour le mapping""" 
 723   

 724 -  def __init__(self, name, coors): 

 725      self.name = name 
 726      x0, y0, x1, y1 = coors 
 727      dx =  x1-x0 
 728      dy =  y1-y0 
 729      # 2 cas selon que la barre est plutot verticale ou horizontale 
 730      if abs(dx) >= abs(dy): 
 731        self.inv = False 
 732        # le sens de parcourt est choisi pour que x augmente 
 733        if dx >= 0: 
 734          self.coors = (x0, y0, dx, dy) 
 735        else: 
 736          self.coors = (x1, y1, -dx, -dy) 
 737      else: 
 738        self.inv = True 
 739        # le sens de parcourt est choisi pour que y augmente 
 740        if dy >= 0: 
 741          self.coors = (x0, y0, dx, dy) 
 742        else: 
 743          self.coors = (x1, y1, -dx, -dy) 

 744   

 745 -  def get_is_selected(self, x, y, m): 

 746      """Retourne False or True si la barre est mappée""" 
 747      x0, y0, deltax, deltay = self.coors 
 748      if not self.inv: 
 749        if x < x0 or x > x0+deltax: 
 750          return False 
 751        y1 = deltay * (x-x0) / deltax + y0 
 752        d = abs(y-y1) 
 753        if d < m: 
 754          return True 
 755      else: 
 756        if y < y0 or y > y0+deltay: 
 757          return False 
 758        x1 = deltax * (y-y0) / deltay + x0 
 759        d = abs(x-x1) 
 760        if d < m: 
 761          return True 
 762      return False 

 763   

 764 -  def redraw(self, cr): 

 765      """Redessine la barre à partir des données du mapping""" 
 766      x0, y0, dx, dy = self.coors 
 767      cr.move_to(x0, y0) 
 768      cr.rel_line_to(dx, dy) 
 769      cr.stroke() 
 770      draw_square(cr, x0, y0) 
 771      draw_square(cr, x0+dx, y0+dy)

 931      if x < x0: 
 932        change = True 
 933        x0 = x-Hm 
 934      elif x > x1: 
 935        x1 = x+Hm 
 936        change = True

 938        y0 = y-Vm

 940      elif y > y1: 
 941        y1 = y+Vm 
 942        change = True

 945        self.box[id] = (int(x0), int(y0), int(x1-x0), int(y1-y0))

1139      self.s_values = [] 
1140      self.s_case = None 
1141      self.s_curve = None 
1142      self.s_bar = None

1145      self.chart_zoom = 1.

1302          try: 
1303            self.s_case = int(val[0]) 
1304          except IndexError: 
1305            pass

1307          self.s_cases = [int(i) for i in val]

1309          for i, elem in enumerate(val):

1312            u, status, id = float(u), int(status), int(id)

1317              continue

1321                del(self.user_values[self.status][id]) 
1322          try: 
1323            self.s_influ = self.influ_list.keys()[0] 
1324          except IndexError: 
1325            pass 
1326      else: 
1327        self.status = 1 
1328      if not tag: 
1329        try: 
1330          del(self.x0) 
1331          del(self.y0) 
1332          print "debug::effacement x0, y0"

1334          pass

1427 -  def test_user_values(self, di): 

1428      """Teste la syntaxe du dictionnaire des valeurs utilisateur""" 
1429      for status in di: 
1430        for case in di[status]: 
1431          for name in di[status][case]: 
1432            for u in di[status][case][name]: 
1433              values = di[status][case][name][u] 
1434              for key in values: 
1435                if not key in [0, 1]: 
1436                  return False 
1437                tu = values[key] 
1438                if not isinstance(tu, tuple): 
1439                  return False 
1440                if not len(tu) == 3: 
1441                  return False 
1442                x, y, tag = tu 
1443                try: 
1444                  x+y 
1445                except ValueError: 
1446                  return False 
1447                if not isinstance(tu[2], bool): 
1448                  return False 
1449      return True

1468          self.mapping.set_info(self.id, obj) 
1469          self.scale_id = obj.id 
1470        except ValueError: 
1471          pass

1482 -  def delete_value(self, n, legend): 

1483      """Efface une valeur ou la masque si valeur automatique""" 
1484      u, barre, disc, auto = legend.u, legend.name, legend.disc, legend.auto 
1485      if auto: 
1486        try: 
1487          value = self.user_values[self.status][n][barre][u] 
1488          dx, dy, tag = value[disc] 
1489          value[disc] = (dx, dy, True) 
1490        except KeyError: 
1491          self._set_user_values(n, barre, u, disc, hide=True) 
1492      else: 
1493        value = self.user_values[self.status][n][barre] 
1494        del(value[u][disc]) 
1495        if len(value[u]) == 0: 
1496          del(value[u])

1504 -  def _set_user_values(self, n, barre, u, disc, x=None, y=None, hide=False): 

1505      """place une valeur dans le dictionnaire des user_values""" 
1506      #print " _set_user_values", n, barre, u, disc, x, y 
1507      mv = self.user_values 
1508      if not self.status in mv: 
1509        mv[self.status] = {} 
1510      if not n in mv[self.status]: 
1511        mv[self.status][n] = {} 
1512      di = mv[self.status][n] 
1513      if not barre in di: 
1514        di[barre] = {} 
1515      if not u in di[barre]: 
1516        di[barre][u] = {} 
1517      di2 = di[barre][u] 
1518      if not disc in di2: 
1519        if x is None: 
1520          di2[disc] = (0, 0, hide) 
1521        else: 
1522          di2[disc] = (x, y, hide) 
1523      else: 
1524        x0, y0 = di2[disc][0:2] 
1525        if x is None: 
1526          di2[disc] = (x0, y0, hide) 
1527        else: 
1528          di2[disc] = (x, y, hide) # tester et finir 

1529      #print self.user_values

1531 -  def _get_user_value(self, n, barre, u, disc, hide): 

1532      """Retourne un sous dictionnaire de user_values si la valeur de u (ou approchée) a été trouvée""" 
1533      #print "_get_user_value", n, barre, u 
1534      u_v = self.user_values 
1535      if not self.status in u_v: 
1536        return False 
1537      if not n in u_v[self.status]: 
1538        return False 
1539      di = u_v[self.status][n] 
1540      if not barre in di: 
1541        return False 
1542      for pos in di[barre]: 
1543        if pos == 0 and u == 0: 
1544          break 
1545        if abs(u-pos)/pos < 1e-8: 
1546          break 
1547        return False 
1548      di2 = di[barre][pos] 
1549      if not disc in di2: 
1550        return False 
1551      return di[barre], pos 

1552   

1553 -  def restore_values(self, n): 

1554      """Supprime dans le dictionnaire des valeurs cachées les élements pour la courbe n""" 
1555      try: 
1556        values = self.user_values[self.status] 
1557      except KeyError: 
1558        return 
1559      try: 
1560        bars_values = values[n] 
1561      except KeyError: 
1562        return 
1563      for barre in bars_values: 
1564        bar_values = bars_values[barre] 
1565        for u in bar_values: 
1566          for i, disc in enumerate(bar_values[u]): 
1567            dx, dy , hide = bar_values[u][disc] 
1568            if hide is True: 
1569              bar_values[u][i] = (dx, dy, False)

1583      struct = rdm.struct

1587      elif status == 1:

1595      elif status == 7:

1597      elif status == 8:

1603 -  def _adjust_drawing(self, struct, sw_w, sw_h): 

1604      """Ajuste l'objet Rdm pour la fenetre graphique 
1605      Déplace l'objet, le centre en fonction de la marge margin""" 
1606      #print "adjust_drawing", sw_w, sw_h 
1607      zoom = self.struct_zoom 
1608      Umargin = Lmargin = Const.AREA_MARGIN 
1609      width, height = struct.width, struct.height 
1610      scale = self._get_scale(width, height, sw_w, sw_h, Umargin) 
1611      self.struct_scale = scale 
1612      if scale is None: 
1613        self.x0 = int(sw_w/2) 
1614        self.y0 = int(sw_h/2) 
1615        return 
1616      scale = scale*zoom 
1617      struct_w = int(scale*width) 
1618      struct_h = int(scale*height) 
1619   
1620      # calcul des marges 
1621      if sw_w-2*Lmargin > struct_w: 
1622        Lmargin = int((sw_w-struct_w)/2) 
1623      if sw_h-2*Umargin > struct_h: 
1624        Umargin = int((sw_h-struct_h)/2) 
1625   
1626      # définition du point d'ancrage 
1627      n = Drawing.class_counter % 3 # pour éviter superposition 
1628      self.x0 = int(Lmargin) 
1629      self.y0 = int(Umargin + height*scale + n*10) 

1630   

1631 -  def adjust_drawing2(self, struct, sw_w, sw_h): 

1632      """Calcule une nouvelle échelle pour que la structure tienne dans la page et déplace éventuellement l'origine du dessin""" 
1633      #print "adjust_drawing", sw_w, sw_h 
1634      zoom = self.struct_zoom 
1635      m = Const.AREA_MARGIN 
1636      width, height = struct.width, struct.height 
1637      w = sw_w - self.x0 - m 
1638      if w < 100: 
1639        self.x0 = 200 
1640        w = sw_w -200 - m 
1641      h = self.y0 - m 
1642      if h < 100: 
1643        self.y0 = 200 
1644        h = 100 
1645      scale = self._get_scale(width, height, w, h, 0) 
1646      self.struct_scale = scale 

1647   

1648 -  def _get_scale(self, width, height, area_min_w, area_min_h, margin): 

1649      """Retourne l'echelle pour le tracé de la structure""" 
1650      #print "_get_scale" 
1651      w = area_min_w-2*margin 
1652      h = area_min_h-2*margin 
1653      maxi = max(width, height) 
1654      scale_w = width/w 
1655      scale_h = height/h 
1656      scale = max(scale_w, scale_h) 
1657      # pour éviter une division par zéro 
1658      #assert(scale >= 0) 
1659      if scale == 0.: 
1660        return None 
1661      scale = 1./scale 
1662      maxi *= scale 
1663      if maxi > 500: # limitation 500px 
1664        scale = scale/maxi*500 
1665      if scale > 1: 
1666        scale = round(scale, 1) 
1667      return scale 

1668

1670 -  def del_patterns(self): 

1671      """Supprime tous les patterns du drawing""" 
1672      #print "del_patterns" 
1673      if hasattr(self, 'p_struct'): 
1674        del(self.p_struct) 
1675      self.p_infos = {} 
1676      if hasattr(self, 'p_bind'): 
1677        del(self.p_bind) 
1678      if hasattr(self, 'p_char'): 
1679        del(self.p_char) 
1680      if hasattr(self, 'p_reac'): 
1681        del(self.p_reac) 
1682      if hasattr(self, 'p_window'): 
1683        del(self.p_window) 
1684      if hasattr(self, 'p_barre'): 
1685        del(self.p_barre) 
1686      if hasattr(self, 'p_select'): 
1687        del(self.p_select) 

1688   

1689 -  def get_max_scale(self, value, study): 

1690      """Vérifie si la nouvelle échelle n'est pas trop grande""" 
1691      scale = self.struct_scale*self.struct_zoom 
1692      struct = study.rdm.struct 
1693      width, height = struct.width, struct.height 
1694      struct_w, struct_h = scale*width, scale*height 
1695      coef = value/scale 
1696      max_size = max(struct_w, struct_h)*coef 
1697      if max_size <= 1000: 
1698        return True 
1699      return False

1738 -  def _push_selected_barre(self, cr, struct, barre, width=1, color=None): 

1739      """Dessine une seule barre de la structure""" 
1740      scale = self.struct_scale*self.struct_zoom 
1741      if scale is None: 
1742        return 
1743      cr.push_group() 
1744      cr.translate(self.x0, self.y0) 
1745      if not color is None: 
1746        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
1747      cr.scale(scale, scale) 
1748      cr.set_line_width(width/scale) 
1749      bars = struct.Barres 
1750      nodes = struct.Nodes 
1751      angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
1752      node1 = bars[barre][0] 
1753      node2 = bars[barre][1] 
1754      x1, y1 = nodes[node1] 
1755      x2, y2 = nodes[node2] 
1756      y1 = -y1 
1757      y2 = -y2 
1758      cr.move_to(x1, y1) 
1759      cr.line_to(x2, y2) 
1760      cr.stroke() 
1761      #cr.restore() 
1762      self.p_barre = cr.pop_group()

1899                          angle, mirror=False)

1913          Fy = abs(Fy)

2134 -  def _set_curve_values_arc(self, cr, study, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_case, barres=None): 

2135      """Prépare le mapping pour les valeurs d'une courbe correspondant à un arc""" 
2136      rdm = study.rdm 
2137      struct = rdm.struct 
2138      if len(struct.Curves) == 0: 
2139        return 
2140      if self.status == 7: 
2141        maxi = study.get_max(self) 
2142      else: 
2143        maxi = study._get_soll_max() 
2144      if maxi is None: 
2145        return 
2146      crit = maxi / 1e8 
2147      units = struct.units 
2148      Char = rdm.GetCharByNumber(n_case) 
2149      if self.status == 4: 
2150        n_soll = 0 
2151        unit_conv = units['F'] 
2152        f = rdm.GetArcSollValues 
2153      elif self.status == 5: 
2154        n_soll = 1 
2155        unit_conv = units['F'] 
2156        f = rdm.GetArcSollValues 
2157      elif self.status == 6: 
2158        n_soll = 2 
2159        unit_conv = units['L']*units['F'] 
2160        f = rdm.GetArcSollValues 
2161      elif self.status == 7: 
2162        f = rdm.GetArcDefoValues 
2163        n_soll = 2 # inutile 
2164        unit_conv = units['L'] 
2165      try: 
2166        user_values = self.user_values[self.status][n_case] 
2167      except KeyError: 
2168        user_values = {} 
2169      di = {} 
2170      for arc in struct.Curves: 
2171        data = f(arc, Char, n_soll, crit) 
2172        di2 = {} 
2173        user_value = {} 
2174        if arc in user_values: 
2175          user_value = user_values[arc] 
2176        self._get_user_values2(rdm, arc, Char, user_value, data)

2180          x, y = struct.Nodes[N0] 
2181          cr.save() 
2182          cr.translate(self.x0 + x*struct_scale, self.y0 - y*struct_scale) 
2183          angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
2184          if not angle == 0: 
2185            cr.rotate(angle) 
2186          cr.scale(struct_scale, chart_scale) 
2187          dy = self._get_text_pos(val) 
2188          x, y = cr.user_to_device(0., -val+dy/chart_scale) 
2189          di2[pos] = [[(0., val), int(x), int(y), angle, 0, True]] 
2190          cr.restore() 
2191        di[arc] = di2 
2192      self.mapping.set_curve_values(self, di, n_case, 'arc')

2210      try: 
2211        user_values = self.user_values[self.status][n_case] 
2212      except KeyError: 
2213        user_values = {} 
2214      di = {} 
2215      for barre in barres: 
2216        x, y = struct.Nodes[struct.Barres[barre][0]] # origine barre 
2217        di2 = {} 
2218        angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
2219        l = struct.Lengths[barre] 
2220        cr.save() 
2221        cr.translate(self.x0 + x*struct_scale, self.y0 - y*struct_scale) 
2222        if not angle == 0: 
2223          cr.rotate(angle) 
2224        cr.scale(struct_scale, chart_scale) 
2225        bar_values = rdm.bar_values[barre] 
2226        self._get_user_values(rdm, Char, barre, user_values, bar_values, l) 
2227        for u, data in bar_values.items(): 
2228          u = u*l 
2229          di2[u] = [] 
2230          for pos, val in data.items(): 
2231            dy = self._get_text_pos(val) 
2232            x, y = cr.user_to_device(u, -val+dy/chart_scale) 
2233            if pos == 2: # provisoire 
2234              pos -= 2 
2235              auto = False 
2236            else: 
2237              auto = True 
2238            di2[u].append([(0., val), int(x), int(y), angle, pos, auto]) 
2239        cr.restore() 
2240        di[barre] = di2 
2241      self.mapping.set_curve_values(self, di, n_case)

2377 -  def _draw_bind_dep(self, cr, rdm, struct_scale, ampli, Char, color=None, alpha=1.): 

2378      """Dessine les appuis simples ayant subi un déplacement""" 
2379      cr.save() 
2380      if not color is None: 
2381        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color, alpha) 
2382      ddlValue = Char.ddlValue 
2383      for noeud, liaison in rdm.struct.Liaisons.items(): 
2384        dx, dy = ddlValue[noeud][0]*ampli, -ddlValue[noeud][1]*ampli 
2385        delta = (dx**2 + dy**2)**0.5 
2386        if delta < 5: 
2387          continue 
2388        x1, y1 = rdm.struct.Nodes[noeud] 
2389        if liaison == 0: 
2390          angle = self._get_clumping_angle(struct, noeud) 
2391          self._draw_clumping(cr, self.x0+dx, self.y0+dy, x1, y1, 
2392                          struct_scale, angle) 
2393        elif liaison == 1: 
2394          self._draw_hinge(cr, self.x0+dx, self.y0+dy, x1, y1, 
2395                          struct_scale) 
2396        elif liaison == 2: 
2397          teta = 0. 
2398          relax = False 
2399          if noeud in rdm.struct.AppuiIncline: 
2400            teta = -rdm.struct.AppuiIncline[noeud]  
2401          if rdm.struct.IsRelax.get(noeud) == 1: 
2402            relax = True 
2403          self._draw_simple_support(cr, self.x0+dx, self.y0+dy, x1, y1, 
2404                          struct_scale, teta, relax) 
2405        elif liaison == 3: 
2406          self._draw_elastic_support(cr, self.x0+dx, self.y0+dy, x1, y1, 
2407                          struct_scale) 
2408      cr.restore()

2438 -  def _draw_single_bar_curve(self, cr, rdm, barre, segs, x0, y0, x1, y1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_case, color=None, width=1, mode=False): 

2439      """Dessine pour une barre une sollicitation données par segs 
2440      sous forme d'une courbe continue""" 
2441      #print "_draw_single_bar_curve", barre, segs 
2442      unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
2443      angle = -rdm.struct.Angles[barre] 
2444      cr.save() 
2445      if not color is None: 
2446        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
2447      cr.set_line_width(width) 
2448      cr.save() 
2449      cr.translate(x0 + x1*struct_scale, y0 - y1*struct_scale) 
2450      if not angle == 0: 
2451        cr.rotate(angle) 
2452      cr.scale(struct_scale, chart_scale) 
2453      pt_dashes = [] 
2454      mappings = [] 
2455      pt0 = cr.user_to_device(0., 0.) # origine de la barre 
2456      n = len(segs) 
2457      for i, data in enumerate(segs): 
2458        dx = data[0][0] # delta x 
2459        dy = -data[0][1] # delta y vers le bas 
2460        if i == 0: 
2461          cr.move_to(0., dy) 
2462          if mode == 2: 
2463            pt_dashes.append((0. , 0., dy)) 
2464          x = 0. 
2465          y = dy 
2466          prec = cr.user_to_device(x, y) 
2467          mappings.append((prec, )) 
2468          continue 
2469        if dx == 0.: 
2470          # discontinuité 
2471          cr.rel_move_to(0., dy) 
2472          pt_dashes.append((x , y, y+dy)) 
2473          y += dy 
2474          prec = cr.user_to_device(x, y) 
2475          mappings.append((prec, )) 
2476          continue 
2477        current = cr.user_to_device(x+dx, y+dy) 
2478        if len(data) == 2: 
2479          cr.rel_line_to(dx, dy) 
2480          mappings.append((prec, current, data[1])) 
2481        elif len(data) == 4: 
2482          dC1x, dC1y = data[1] 
2483          dC2x, dC2y = data[2] 
2484          a, b, c, d = data[3] # parabolic coefs 
2485          a, b, c, d = a*chart_scale/struct_scale**3, b*chart_scale/struct_scale**2, c*chart_scale/struct_scale, d*chart_scale 
2486          cr.rel_curve_to(dC1x, -dC1y, dC2x, -dC2y, dx, dy) 
2487          C1x, C1y = cr.user_to_device(x+dC1x, y-dC1y) 
2488          C2x, C2y = cr.user_to_device(x+dC2x, y-dC2y) 
2489          bezier_pts = (C1x, C1y, C2x, C2y, current[0], current[1]) 
2490  # optimiser pt0 présent dans chaque tuple ?? 
2491          coefs = (a, b, c, d) 
2492          geom = (x*struct_scale, 0., dx*struct_scale, 0., angle) 
2493          tu = (pt0, coefs, geom, bezier_pts) 
2494          mappings.append(tu) 
2495        else: 
2496          print "debug anomalie dans _draw_single_bar_curve", len(data), data 
2497        x += dx 
2498        y += dy 
2499        prec = current 
2500        if mode == 2 and i == n-1: 
2501          pt_dashes.append((x , y, 0.)) 
2502      cr.restore() 
2503      cr.stroke() 
2504      self._draw_ligne_attache2(cr, x1, y1, struct_scale, chart_scale, angle, pt_dashes) 
2505      cr.restore() 
2506      self.mapping.set_curves(self.id, n_case, barre, mappings)

2509 -  def _draw_one_bar_defo(self, cr, study, barre, segs, x0, y0, x1, y1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_case, color=None, width=1, mode=False): 

2510      """Dessine la déformée pour une barre""" 
2511      #print "_draw_one_bar_defo", barre 
2512      #self._print_controls_point(data) 
2513      rdm = study.rdm 
2514      unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
2515      angle = -rdm.struct.Angles[barre] 
2516      cr.save() 
2517      if not color is None: 
2518        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
2519      cr.set_line_width(width) 
2520      cr.save() 
2521      cr.translate(x0 + x1*struct_scale, y0 - y1*struct_scale) 
2522      if not angle == 0: 
2523        cr.rotate(angle) 
2524      cr.scale(struct_scale, chart_scale) 
2525      ampli = chart_scale / struct_scale 
2526      mappings = [] 
2527      pt0 = cr.user_to_device(0., 0.) # origine de la barre 
2528      n = len(segs) 
2529      for i, data in enumerate(segs): 
2530        du = data[0][0] # variation de l'abscisse le long de la barre 
2531        defox = data[0][1]*ampli # déformée dans le sens de la barre (extrémité) 
2532        defoy = -data[0][2] # déformée perpendiculaire (+=vers le bas) 
2533        if i == 0: 
2534          cr.move_to(du+defox, defoy) 
2535          dx = defox 
2536          dy = defoy 
2537          u = du 
2538          prec = cr.user_to_device(du+defox, defoy) 
2539          mappings.append((prec, )) 
2540          continue 
2541   
2542        lx = du + defox 
2543        current = cr.user_to_device(u+dx+lx, dy+defoy) 
2544        if len(data) == 1: 
2545          cr.rel_line_to(du+defox, defoy) 
2546          mappings.append((prec, current, (0., du))) 
2547        elif len(data) == 4: 
2548          dC1x, dC1y = data[1] 
2549          dC2x, dC2y = data[2] 
2550          # correction des x des points de controles si raccourcissement ou allongement de la barre  
2551          dC1x += defox/3 
2552          dC2x += 2*defox/3 
2553   
2554          # polynome coefs 
2555          n = len(data[3]) - 1 
2556          coefs = [] 
2557          # changement de repère pour tenir compte d'un allongement de la barre 
2558          k = 1+defox/du # (x'=kx et k=(du+defox)/du ) 
2559          # !! les coefs du polynome sont donnés dans la barre non déformée 
2560          for j in data[3]: 
2561            j = j*chart_scale/(k*struct_scale)**n 
2562            coefs.append(j) 
2563            n = n - 1 
2564          cr.rel_curve_to(dC1x, -dC1y, dC2x, -dC2y, du+defox, defoy) 
2565          C1x, C1y = cr.user_to_device(u+dx+dC1x, dy-dC1y) 
2566          C2x, C2y = cr.user_to_device(u+dx+dC2x, dy-dC2y) 
2567          bezier_pts = (C1x, C1y, C2x, C2y, current[0], current[1]) 
2568          # geom = (u0 non déformée, déplacement origine, longueur déformée, angle) 
2569          geom = (u*struct_scale, dx*struct_scale, du*struct_scale, defox*struct_scale, angle) 
2570          #geom = (u*struct_scale, dx*struct_scale, (du+defox)*struct_scale, angle) 
2571          tu = (pt0, coefs, geom, bezier_pts) 
2572          mappings.append(tu) 
2573        else: 
2574          print "debug anomalie dans _draw_one_bar_defo" 
2575        u += du 
2576        dx += defox 
2577        dy += defoy 
2578        prec = current 
2579      cr.restore() 
2580      cr.stroke() 
2581      cr.restore() 
2582      self.mapping.set_curves(self.id, n_case, barre, mappings)

2585 -  def _delete_node_val(self, rdm): 

2586      """Supprime les valeurs en double sur les noeuds""" 
2587      def get_is_in_list(val, li): 
2588        eps = 1e-6 
2589        for elem in li: 
2590          if abs(val-elem) < eps: 
2591            return True 
2592        return False 

2593   
2594      struct = rdm.struct 
2595      bar_values = rdm.bar_values 
2596       
2597      #print "bar_values", bar_values 
2598      barre_by_node = struct.BarByNode 
2599      for noeud, tu in barre_by_node.items(): 
2600        data = [] 
2601        for barre in tu[0]: 
2602          if not barre in bar_values: 
2603            continue 
2604          values = bar_values[barre] 
2605          if not 0. in values: 
2606            continue 
2607          val = values[0.][0] 
2608          #print "+++", barre, val, data 
2609          if get_is_in_list(val, data): 
2610            del(bar_values[barre][0.]) 
2611          else: 
2612            data.append(val) 
2613        for barre in tu[1]: 
2614          if not barre in bar_values: 
2615            continue 
2616          values = bar_values[barre] 
2617          if not 1. in values: 
2618            continue 
2619          val = values[1.][0] 
2620          if get_is_in_list(val, data): 
2621            del(bar_values[barre][1.]) 
2622          else: 
2623            data.append(val) 

2624   

2625 -  def _get_text_pos(self, value): 

2626      """Retourne le décalage en px d'un texte suivant le signe de value dans le repère de la barre""" 
2627      h = 12 
2628      return value >= 0 and -0.8 * h or 1.15 * h

2631 -  def get_interpolation_bars(self, rdm, arc): 

2632      """Retourne une liste de tuple contenant les barres sur lesquelles sont interpolées les courbes - Chaque tuple correspond à une courbe continue""" 
2633      #print "get_interpolation_bars", arc 
2634      struct = rdm.struct 
2635      Arc = struct.Curves[arc] 
2636      user_nodes = Arc.user_nodes 
2637      start, end = Arc.b0, Arc.b1 
2638      da = struct.Angles[start+1] - struct.Angles[start] 
2639      b = start 
2640      li_barres = [] 
2641      for Node in user_nodes[1:]: 
2642        end_bar = Node.end 
2643        n_bars = end_bar-b+1 
2644        a = abs(da)*n_bars 
2645        n_inter = max(2, int(round(a/0.4)),  int(round(float(n_bars)/8))) # parameter : 0,5 radian -> influe sur la précision du tracé ou toutes les 8 barres 
2646        if n_inter > n_bars: 
2647          print "debug in get_interpolation_bars" 
2648          n_inter = n_bars 
2649        li2 = [b] 
2650        pas = float(n_bars)/n_inter 
2651        for i in range(n_inter-1): 
2652          b += pas 
2653          li2.append(int(b)) 
2654        if not b == end_bar: 
2655          li2.append(end_bar) 
2656        b = end_bar+1 
2657        li_barres.append(tuple(li2)) 
2658      return li_barres, start, end 

2659   

2660 -  def _get_bezier_list(self, cr, rdm, arc, Char, struct_scale, chart_scale): 

2661      """Retourne une liste de points de controle pour le tracé d'une courbe sur un arc 
2662      Format: [[(x0, y0, c0x, c0y, c1x, c1y, x1, y1), ()], [()]] -> les sous-listes correspondent aux tronçons entre user_nodes""" 
2663      #print "_get_bezier_list", arc 
2664      struct = rdm.struct 
2665      X0, Y0 = self.x0, self.y0 
2666      if self.status == 4: 
2667        n_soll = 0 
2668        f = self._get_device_point 
2669      elif self.status == 5: 
2670        n_soll = 1 
2671        f = self._get_device_point 
2672      elif self.status == 6: 
2673        n_soll = 2 
2674        f = self._get_device_point 
2675      elif self.status == 7: 
2676        n_soll = None 
2677        f = self._get_device_point2 
2678      li_barres, start, end = self.get_interpolation_bars(rdm, arc) 
2679      #print "liBarres=", li_barres 
2680      pt_device = {} 
2681      for tu in li_barres: 
2682        n = len(tu) 
2683        for j, b in enumerate(tu): 
2684          if b == start and j == 0: 
2685            xd0, yd0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 0) 
2686            xd1, yd1 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b+1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 2) 
2687          elif j == 0: 
2688            xd0, yd0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 0, average_angle=True) 
2689            xd1, yd1 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b+1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 2) 
2690          elif b == end and j == n-1: 
2691            xd0, yd0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 2) 
2692            xd1, yd1 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 1) 
2693          elif j == n-1: 
2694            xd0, yd0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 2) 
2695            xd1, yd1 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 1, average_angle=True) 
2696          else: 
2697            xd0, yd0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 2) 
2698            xd1, yd1 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b+1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 2) 
2699          pt_device[b] = (xd0, yd0, xd1, yd1) 
2700   
2701      li = [] 
2702      #print "li_barres=", li_barres 
2703      for tu1 in li_barres: 
2704        n = len(tu1) 
2705        li2 = [] 
2706        for i in range(n-1): 
2707          b, next_b = tu1[i:i+2] 
2708          #print "barre=", b, next_b 
2709          xd0_0, yd0_0, xd0_1, yd0_1 = pt_device[b] 
2710          xd1_0, yd1_0, xd1_1, yd1_1 = pt_device[next_b] 
2711          d_corde = ((xd0_0-xd1_0)**2+(yd0_0-yd1_0)**2)**0.5 
2712          a_corde = -function.get_vector_angle((xd0_0, yd0_0), (xd1_0, yd1_0)) 
2713          if i == 0: # on prend la pente avec la barre suivante pour éviter effet escalier sur effort tranchant 
2714            xd1_0, yd1_0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, b+1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 0) 
2715            dx0, dy0 = xd1_0-xd0_0, yd1_0-yd0_0 
2716            a0 = -function.get_vector_angle((xd0_0, yd0_0), (xd1_0, yd1_0)) 
2717            coef = d_corde/3/math.cos( a0-a_corde) 
2718            d0 = (dx0**2 + dy0**2)**0.5 
2719            C0xprec, C0yprec = xd0_0 + dx0*coef/d0, yd0_0 + dy0*coef/d0 
2720            xdprec, ydprec = xd0_0, yd0_0 
2721            b0, b1 = b, next_b-1 
2722            continue 
2723          dx0, dy0 = xd0_1-xd0_0, yd0_1-yd0_0 
2724          d0 = (dx0**2 + dy0**2)**0.5 
2725          a0 = -function.get_vector_angle((xd0_0, yd0_0), (xd0_1, yd0_1)) 
2726          coef = d_corde/3/math.cos( a0-a_corde) 
2727          C0x, C0y = xd0_0 - dx0*coef/d0, yd0_0 - dy0*coef/d0 
2728          tu = (xdprec, ydprec, C0xprec, C0yprec, C0x, C0y, xd0_0, yd0_0, b0, b1) 
2729          li2.append(tu) 
2730          b0, b1 = b, next_b-1 
2731          
2732          C0xprec, C0yprec = xd0_0 + dx0*coef/d0, yd0_0 + dy0*coef/d0 
2733          xdprec, ydprec = xd0_0, yd0_0 
2734        # cloture dernier segment 
2735        # on calcule la dernière pente à partir de la valeur 1 de l'avant dernière barre (à cause de la forme discontinue de V sur un arc) 
2736        xd1_0, yd1_0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, next_b-1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 1) 
2737        a1 = -function.get_vector_angle((xd1_0, yd1_0), (xd1_1, yd1_1)) 
2738        coef = d_corde/3/math.cos( a1-a_corde) 
2739        dx0, dy0 = xd1_1-xd1_0, yd1_1-yd1_0 
2740        d1 = (dx0**2 + dy0**2)**0.5 
2741        C0x, C0y = xd1_1 - dx0*coef/d1, yd1_1 - dy0*coef/d1 
2742        tu = (xdprec, ydprec, C0xprec, C0yprec, C0x, C0y, xd1_1, yd1_1, b0, b1+1) 
2743        li2.append(tu) 
2744        li.append(li2) 
2745      return li

2747 -  def _draw_end_bar_debug(self, cr, rdm, arc, Char, struct_scale, chart_scale): 

2748      """Dessine les valeurs exactes des sollicitation ou deplacements sur les barres de l'arc"""

2750      struct = rdm.struct

2752      X0, Y0 = self.x0, self.y0 
2753      cr.save()

2760      elif self.status == 6:

2762        f = self._get_device_point

2765        f = self._get_device_point2

2770        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, "red") 
2771        cr.arc(xd0, yd0, 0.5, 0, 6.29) 
2772        cr.stroke() 
2773        # valeur à la fin 
2774        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, "grey") 
2775        xd0, yd0 = f(cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, barre, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, 1) 
2776        cr.arc(xd0, yd0, 0.5, 0, 6.29) 
2777        cr.stroke() 
2778      cr.restore()

2780 -  def _get_device_point(self, cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, barre, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, position, average_angle=False): 

2781      """Retourne les coordonnées d'un point (d'un arc) du tracé d'une sollicitation dans le repère du device""" 
2782      if position == 0: # arc start 
2783        if average_angle: 
2784          angle = -(struct.Angles[barre-1]+struct.Angles[barre])/2 
2785        else: 
2786          angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
2787        soll = Char.EndBarSol[barre][0][n_soll] 
2788        pos = 0 
2789      elif position == 1: # end arc 
2790        # inversion des signes par rapport RDM pour repère info 
2791        soll = -Char.EndBarSol[barre][1][n_soll] 
2792        if average_angle: 
2793          angle = -(struct.Angles[barre+1]+struct.Angles[barre])/2 
2794        else: 
2795          angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
2796        #angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
2797        pos = 1 
2798      elif position == 2: # current 
2799        angle = -(struct.Angles[barre-1]+struct.Angles[barre])/2 
2800        # réellement utile que pour N et V 
2801        soll = (-Char.EndBarSol[barre-1][1][n_soll]+Char.EndBarSol[barre][0][n_soll])/2 
2802        pos = 0 
2803      node = struct.Barres[barre][pos] 
2804      x0, y0 = struct.Nodes[node] 
2805      cr.save() 
2806      cr.translate(X0 + x0*struct_scale, Y0 - y0*struct_scale) 
2807      if not angle == 0: 
2808        cr.rotate(angle) 
2809      cr.scale(chart_scale, chart_scale) 
2810      xd, yd = cr.user_to_device(0., soll) 
2811      cr.restore() 
2812      return xd, yd 

2813   

2814 -  def _get_device_point2(self, cr, X0, Y0, struct, Char, arc, barre, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_soll, pos, average_angle=False): 

2815      """Retourne les coordonnées d'un point du tracé de la déformée dans le repère du device""" 
2816      if not pos == 1: 
2817        pos = 0 
2818      node = struct.Barres[barre][pos] 
2819      x0, y0 = struct.Nodes[node] 
2820      defx, defy, w = Char.ddlValue[node] 
2821      cr.save() 
2822      cr.translate(X0 + x0*struct_scale, Y0 - y0*struct_scale) 
2823      cr.scale(chart_scale, chart_scale) 
2824      # inversion des signes par rapport RDM pour repère info 
2825      xd, yd = cr.user_to_device(defx, -defy) 
2826      cr.restore() 
2827      return xd, yd

2829  # sauvegarde : calcul d'une bézier en interpolant les temps t1 et t2 

2830 -  def _get_control_points(self, tu): 

2831      """Retourne les points de controle pour la bézier passant par les 4 points donnés dans tu""" 
2832      (x0, y0), (x1, y1), (x2, y2), (x3, y3) = tu 
2833      d1 = ((x0-x1)**2+(y0-y1)**2)**0.5 
2834      d2 = ((x1-x2)**2+(y1-y2)**2)**0.5 
2835      d3 = ((x2-x3)**2+(y2-y3)**2)**0.5 
2836      d = d1 + d2 + d3 
2837      t1, t2 = d1/d, (d1 + d2)/d 
2838      #print "t=", t1, t2 
2839      #t1, t2 = 0.32, 0.68 
2840      a1, a2, a3 = 3*t1*(1-t1)**2, 3*t1**2*(1-t1), x0*(1-t1)**3 + x3*t1**3 
2841      a4 =  y0*(1-t1)**3 + y3*t1**3 
2842      b1, b2, b3 = 3*t2*(1-t2)**2, 3*t2**2*(1-t2), x0*(1-t2)**3 + x3*t2**3 
2843      b4 =  y0*(1-t2)**3 + y3*t2**3 
2844      den = a2*b1 - b2*a1 
2845      c1x = (b1*x1 - a1*x2 + b3*a1 - a3*b1) / den 
2846      c0x = (x1 - a2*c1x - a3) / a1 
2847      c1y = (b1*y1 - a1*y2 + b4*a1 - a4*b1) / den 
2848      c0y = (y1 - a2*c1y - a4) / a1 
2849      #print "controls=", (x0, y0), (c0x, c0y), (c1x, c1y), (x3, y3) 
2850      return (x0, y0), (c0x, c0y), (c1x, c1y), (x3, y3) 

2851   

2852 -  def _get_curve_points(self, rdm, barre, Char): 

2853      """Calcule les sollicitations en fonction du status 
2854      pour une barre donnée - Retourne une liste de liste de valeurs (pour tenir compte des discontinuités)""" 
2855      if self.status == 4: 
2856        points = rdm.ForceBarre(barre, Char, 0) 
2857      elif self.status == 5: 
2858        points = rdm.ForceBarre(barre, Char, 1) 
2859      elif self.status == 6: 
2860        points = rdm.MomentBarre(barre, Char) 
2861      elif self.status == 7: 
2862        points = rdm.DefoBarre(barre, Char) 
2863      return points

2874      elif self.status == 5: 
2875        type = 'V' 
2876      elif self.status == 6:

2899        #print "di=", di 
2900        nb = len(di) 
2901        if nb == 0: 
2902          continue

2906            cr.move_to(pt[0], pt[1]-soll1) 
2907            cr.rel_line_to(0, soll1) 
2908        elif i == n-1:

2911            cr.move_to(pt[0], pt[1])

2916            soll2 = di[1] 
2917            cr.move_to(pt[0], pt[1]-soll1) 
2918            cr.rel_line_to(0, soll1-soll2) 
2919   
2920      cr.restore() 
2921      cr.stroke() 
2922      cr.restore()

3443          if node in struct.Liaisons: 
3444            continue

3447            continue

3450          cr.set_source_rgb(1, 1, 1) 
3451          cr.arc(xi, yi, size/scale, 0, 6.29) 
3452          cr.fill() 
3453          cr.stroke() 
3454          cr.restore()

3513          self._draw_bar_name(cr, xm, ym, name, angle, scale)

3539 -  def _get_mapping_data(self, cr, struct, x0, y0, scale):

3542      mapping = self.mapping 
3543      names = struct.GetBars()

3545      nodes = struct.Nodes

3548      m = 50 
3549      if scale is None:

3551          name = not_linked.keys()[0] 
3552          m_points[name] = (self.x0, self.y0) 
3553        except IndexError:

3566        try: 
3567          x1, y1 = nodes[node1] 
3568          x2, y2 = nodes[node2] 
3569        except ValueError: # undifinied points 
3570          continue 
3571        y1 = -y1 
3572        y2 = -y2 
3573        x1_d, y1_d = cr.user_to_device(x1, y1) 
3574        x2_d, y2_d = cr.user_to_device(x2, y2) 
3575        m_bars[bar] = (x1_d, y1_d, x2_d, y2_d) 
3576        if not node1 in m_points: 
3577          m_points[node1] = (x1_d, y1_d) 
3578        if not node2 in m_points:

3582          x, y = not_linked[node] 
3583        except ValueError: 
3584          continue

3586        x_d, y_d = cr.user_to_device(x, y) 
3587        m_points[node] = (x_d, y_d)

3590      centers = struct.Centers

3593        li_nodes = arc.user_nodes 
3594        for Node in li_nodes: 
3595          node = Node.name 
3596          x, y = nodes[node] 
3597          y = -y 
3598          if not node in m_points: 
3599            x_d, y_d = cr.user_to_device(x, y)

3606          mapping.set_mapping_arc(cr, scale, name, arc, self.id, centers) 
3607   
3608      cr.restore()

3619 -  def _draw_scale(self, study, cr, x, y, scale, influ_status=None): 

3620      """Calcule le format de l'échelle et effectue son tracé 
3621      """ 
3622      rdm = study.rdm 
3623      unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
3624      if self.status in [0, 1, 2, 3, 7]: 
3625        unit_name = study.get_unit_name('L') 
3626        unit = unit_conv['L'] 
3627      elif self.status in [4, 5]: 
3628        unit_name = study.get_unit_name('F') 
3629        unit = unit_conv['F'] 
3630      elif self.status == 6: 
3631        unit_F = study.get_unit_name('F') 
3632        unit_L = study.get_unit_name('L') 
3633        unit_name = '%s.%s' % (unit_F, unit_L) 
3634        unit = unit_conv['L']*unit_conv['F'] 
3635      elif self.status == 8: 
3636        if influ_status == 2: 
3637          unit_F = study.get_unit_name('F') 
3638          unit_L = study.get_unit_name('L') 
3639          unit_name = '%s.%s' % (unit_F, unit_L) 
3640          unit = unit_conv['L']*unit_conv['F'] 
3641        elif influ_status == 3: 
3642          unit_name = study.get_unit_name('L') 
3643          unit = unit_conv['L'] 
3644        else: 
3645          unit_name = study.get_unit_name('F') 
3646          unit = unit_conv['F'] 
3647      SCALE = Const.SCALE # 100 px 
3648      u = scale*SCALE/unit 
3649      if u < 1e-12: # vérifier critère XXX 
3650        return 0, 0 
3651      exp = int(math.log(u, 10)) 
3652      u0 = float('1e%s' % (exp-1)) 
3653      long = u0/u 
3654      if long > 1: 
3655        print "debug::_draw_scale -> ne devrait pas être > 1" 
3656      if long < 0.02: 
3657        long *= 50 
3658        u0 *= 50 
3659      if long < 0.05: 
3660        long *= 20 
3661        u0 *= 20 
3662      elif long < 0.1: 
3663        long *= 10 
3664        u0 *= 10 
3665      elif long < 0.2: 
3666        long *= 5 
3667        u0 *= 5 
3668      elif long < 0.4: 
3669        long *= 2 
3670        u0 *= 2 
3671      long *= SCALE 
3672      value = function.PrintValue(u0, 1, True) 
3673      text = '%s %s' % (value, unit_name) 
3674   
3675      cr.save() 
3676      cr.set_line_width(3) 
3677      cr.set_font_size(Const.FONT_SIZE) 
3678      self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, "grey") 
3679      cr.translate(x, y) 
3680      cr.move_to(0, 0) 
3681      cr.rel_line_to(long, 0) 
3682      cr.stroke() 
3683      x_bearing, y_bearing, width, height = cr.text_extents(text)[:4] 
3684      cr.move_to(long/2-width/2, -8) 
3685      cr.show_text(text) 
3686      cr.restore() 
3687      return long, 25 

3688   
3689   

3690 -  def _draw_axis(self, cr, x, y, angle, scale):

3693      cr.translate(x, y) 
3694      cr.rotate(angle) 
3695      cr.move_to(0, -5/scale) 
3696      cr.rel_line_to(12/scale, 0) 
3697      cr.stroke() 
3698      cr.move_to(0, -5/scale) 
3699      cr.rel_line_to(0, -12/scale) 
3700      cr.stroke() 
3701      cr.restore()

3705        relaxed = struct.IsRelax 
3706      except AttributeError: 
3707        relaxed = {} 
3708        #return False 
3709      cr.save() 
3710      if not color is None: 
3711        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
3712      cr.translate(x0, y0) 
3713      cr.scale(scale, scale) 
3714      # relaxation sur les noeuds 
3715      for noeud in relaxed: 
3716        if not relaxed.get(noeud) == 1: 
3717          continue 
3718        x, y = struct.Nodes[noeud] 
3719        self._draw_one_relax(cr, x, y, scale, False) 
3720      cr.restore() 
3721   
3722  # XXX séparer du reste dans une nouvelle fonction 
3723      # rotules élastiques 
3724      try: 
3725        rotules = struct.RotuleElast 
3726      except AttributeError: 
3727        rotules = {} 
3728      for noeud in rotules: 
3729        n_barre = struct.BarByNode.get(noeud, 2) 
3730        x, y = struct.Nodes[noeud] 
3731        if n_barre >= 3: 
3732          barre = rotules[noeud][0] 
3733          pt1, pt2, rel1, rel2 = struct.Barres[barre] 
3734          if pt1 == noeud: 
3735            delta = 12/scale 
3736          else: 
3737            delta = -12/scale 
3738          angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
3739          cr.save() 
3740          cr.translate(x0+x*scale, y0-y*scale) 
3741          cr.scale(scale, scale) 
3742          cr.rotate(angle) 
3743          self._draw_one_relax(cr, delta, 0, scale, True) 
3744          cr.restore() 
3745        else: 
3746          cr.save() 
3747          cr.translate(x0, y0) 
3748          cr.scale(scale, scale) 
3749          self._draw_one_relax(cr, x, y, scale, True) 
3750          cr.restore() 
3751   
3752      # relaxation sur les barres 
3753      barre_name = list(struct.UserBars) 
3754      barres = struct.Barres 
3755      arcs = struct.Curves 
3756      # ajout barres des arcs 
3757      for name in arcs: 
3758        arc = arcs[name] 
3759        name0, name1 = arc.b0, arc.b1 
3760        r0 = barres[name0][2] 
3761        r1 = barres[name1][3] 
3762        if r0 == 1: 
3763          barre_name.append(name0) 
3764        if r1 == 1: 
3765          barre_name.append(name1) 
3766      for barre in barre_name: 
3767        angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
3768        pt1, pt2, rel1, rel2 = barres[barre] 
3769        if rel1 == 1 and not pt1 in relaxed: 
3770          x1, y1 = struct.Nodes[pt1] 
3771          cr.save() 
3772          cr.translate(x0+x1*scale, y0-y1*scale) 
3773          cr.scale(scale, scale) 
3774          cr.rotate(angle) 
3775          self._draw_one_relax(cr, 12/scale, 0, scale, False) 
3776          cr.restore() 
3777        if rel2 == 1 and not pt2 in relaxed: 
3778          x2, y2 = struct.Nodes[pt2] 
3779          cr.save() 
3780          cr.translate(x0+x2*scale, y0-y2*scale) 
3781          cr.scale(scale, scale) 
3782          cr.rotate(angle) 
3783          self._draw_one_relax(cr, -12/scale, 0, scale, False) 
3784          cr.restore() 

3785

3792      cr.stroke() 
3793      cr.restore()

3834 -  def _draw_bind(self, cr, x0, y0, struct, struct_scale, color=None): 

3835      """Méthode de tracé de l'ensemble des liaisons de la structure""" 
3836      if color is None: 
3837        color = 'blue' 
3838      try: 
3839        liaisons = struct.Liaisons 
3840      except AttributeError: 
3841        return 
3842      for noeud, liaison in liaisons.items():  
3843        try: 
3844          pt = struct.Nodes[noeud] 
3845        except KeyError: 
3846          continue 
3847        x = pt[0] 
3848        y = pt[1] 
3849        _color = color 
3850        if not self.status == 8 and noeud in struct.NodeDeps: 
3851          _color = "red" 
3852        if liaison == 0: 
3853          angle = self._get_clumping_angle(struct, noeud) 
3854          self._draw_clumping(cr, x0, y0, x, y, struct_scale, angle, _color) 
3855        elif liaison == 1: 
3856          if struct.IsRelax.get(noeud) == 1: 
3857            y = y - 6/struct_scale 
3858          self._draw_hinge(cr, x0, y0, x, y, struct_scale, _color) 
3859        elif liaison == 2: 
3860          teta = 0. 
3861          relax = False 
3862          if noeud in struct.AppuiIncline: 
3863            teta = -struct.AppuiIncline[noeud] 
3864          if struct.IsRelax.get(noeud) == 1: 
3865            relax = True 
3866          self._draw_simple_support(cr, x0, y0, x, y, struct_scale, teta, relax, _color) 
3867        elif liaison == 3: 
3868          liRaideur = struct.RaideurAppui[noeud] 
3869          self._draw_elastic_support(cr, x0, y0, x, y, struct_scale, _color)

3871 -  def _get_clumping_angle(self, struct, noeud): 

3872      """Calcule l'angle de la barre dont l'une des extrémité est un encastrement 
3873      retourne un angle""" 
3874      li = struct.BarByNode[noeud] 
3875      for elem in li: 
3876        if len(elem) == 0: 
3877          continue 
3878        barre = elem[0] 
3879        break 
3880      alpha = struct.Angles[barre] 
3881      if alpha < 0: 
3882        alpha += 3.14 
3883      return -alpha + math.pi / 2 

3884   

3885 -  def _draw_clumping(self, cr, x0, y0, x, y, scale, angle=0, color=None): 

3886      """Dessin d'un encastrement""" 
3887      x = x * scale 
3888      y = -y * scale 
3889      cr.save() 
3890      cr.set_line_width(1) 
3891      if not color is None: 
3892        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
3893      cr.translate(x0 + x, y0 + y) 
3894      cr.rotate(angle)  
3895      cr.move_to(-10, 0) 
3896      cr.rel_line_to(21, 0) 
3897      cr.stroke() 
3898   
3899      for i in range(5): 
3900        cr.move_to(-9+5*i, 0) 
3901        cr.rel_line_to(10, 10) 
3902        cr.stroke() 
3903      cr.restore()

3905 -  def _draw_simple_support(self, cr, x0, y0, x, y, scale, angle=0, relax=False, color=None): 

3906      """Dessin d'un appui simple""" 
3907      if relax: 
3908        x = x - 6/scale*math.sin(angle) 
3909        y = y - 6/scale*math.cos(angle) 
3910      x = x * scale 
3911      y = -y * scale

3913      cr.set_line_width(1)

3920      cr.rel_line_to(14, 0) 
3921      cr.close_path() 
3922      cr.stroke() 
3923

3925      cr.stroke()

3927      cr.stroke()

3931      cr.stroke()

4095 -  def _draw_arc_char0(self, cr, X0, Y0, struct_scale, rdm, name, arc_char, color=None):

4097      #print "_draw_arc_char0"

4099      struct = rdm.struct

4111        if norme > maxi: 
4112          maxi = norme 
4113        norme = qx1**2+qy1**2

4134        if not pos in arc_barres: 
4135          break

4137        qx0, qy0 = values[prec_pos][2:] 
4138        qx1, qy1 = values[pos][0:2] 
4139        if b == prec_b: 
4140          l = u-prec_u 
4141        else: 
4142          l = lengths[prec_b]-prec_u + u 
4143          for barre in range(prec_b+1, b): 
4144            l += lengths[barre]

4146        if n_arrows == 0:

4148        else:

4155        y = y0+prec_u*math.sin(a)

4157        norme0 = (qx0**2+qy0**2)**0.5 
4158        norme1 = (qx1**2+qy1**2)**0.5

4169          text1 = function.PrintValue(norme1, unit_conv['F'])

4180          xd, yd = device 
4181          texts_coors.append((xd, yd, prec_b)) 
4182        s = l = lengths[prec_b]-prec_u 
4183        l0 = (pos-prec_pos)*l_arc 
4184        mid_b = int((prec_b+b)/2) 
4185        for barre in range(prec_b+1, b+1): 
4186          dl = lengths[barre] 
4187          if barre == mid_b and texts_size == 1: 
4188            if not device is None: 
4189              xd, yd = device 
4190              texts_coors.append((xd, yd, barre)) 
4191          if s+dl+1e-10 <= pas: 
4192            s += dl 
4193            l += dl 
4194            continue

4196          qy = qy0 + (qy1-qy0)/l0*l

4198          size = arrow_size*norme/maxi

4201          du = pas-s 
4202          if du < 0: 
4203            print "Unexpected pas in _draw_arc_char0"

4207          a = angles[barre] 
4208          x = x0+du*math.cos(a) 
4209          y = y0+du*math.sin(a)

4211          s = dl-du 
4212          l += dl 
4213        cr.restore()

4215        prec_b, prec_u = b, u

4218            xd, yd = device 
4219            texts_coors.append((xd, yd, barre))

4255      texts_coors, texts = [], [] 
4256      prec_pos = points[n-1] 
4257      prec_b, prec_u = arc_barres[prec_pos] 
4258      cr.save() 
4259      cr.set_line_width(1) 
4260      if not color is None: 
4261        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
4262      for pos in points[n:]: 
4263        if not pos in arc_barres: 
4264          break 
4265        b, u = arc_barres[pos] 
4266        qx0, qy0 = values[prec_pos][2:] 
4267        qx1, qy1 = values[pos][0:2] 
4268        norme0 = (qx0**2+qy0**2)**0.5 
4269        norme1 = (qx1**2+qy1**2)**0.5 
4270        if norme0 == 0 and norme1 == 0: 
4271          prec_pos = pos 
4272          prec_b, prec_u = b, u 
4273          continue 
4274        if norme0 == norme1: 
4275          text0 = function.PrintValue(norme0, unit_conv['F']) 
4276          texts.append(text0) 
4277          texts_size = 1 
4278        else: 
4279          text0 = function.PrintValue(norme0, unit_conv['F']) 
4280          text1 = function.PrintValue(norme1, unit_conv['F']) 
4281          texts.append(text0) 
4282          texts.append(text1) 
4283          texts_size = 2 
4284        N0 = barres[prec_b][0] 
4285        N1 = barres[b][0] 
4286        x0, y0 = nodes[N0] 
4287        a0 = angles[prec_b] 
4288        x0 += prec_u*math.cos(a0) 
4289        a1 = angles[b] 
4290        x1, y1 = nodes[N1] 
4291        x1 += u*math.cos(a1) 
4292        x0, y0 = x0*struct_scale, y0*struct_scale 
4293        x1, y1 = x1*struct_scale, y1*struct_scale 
4294        if b - prec_b > 8: 
4295          middle = int((prec_b + b)/2) 
4296          xm, ym = nodes[middle] 
4297          xm, ym = xm*struct_scale, ym*struct_scale 
4298        else: 
4299          xm, ym = x1, y1 
4300        cr.save() 
4301        cr.translate(X0 + x0, Y0 - y0) 
4302        l = x1-x0 
4303        n_arrows = int(l / 20) 
4304        if n_arrows == 0: 
4305          pas = l 
4306        else: 
4307          pas = l/n_arrows 
4308        if y1 >= y0 or ym >= y0: 
4309          dy = max(y1-y0, ym-y0) 
4310          dy = -dy-arrow_size 
4311        else: 
4312          dy = -arrow_size 
4313        translate = qy0 >= 0 and True or False 
4314        norme0 = (qx0**2+qy0**2)**0.5 
4315        norme1 = (qx1**2+qy1**2)**0.5 
4316        text = function.PrintValue(norme0, unit_conv['F']) 
4317        a0 = function.get_vector_angle((0, 0), (qx0, qy0)) 
4318        a1 = function.get_vector_angle((0, 0), (qx1, qy1)) 
4319        s = 0 
4320        mid = int(n_arrows/2) 
4321        for i in range(n_arrows+1): 
4322          size = norme0 + (norme1-norme0)/l*s 
4323          size = size*arrow_size/maxi 
4324          a = a0 + (a1-a0)/l*s 
4325          x, y = self._draw_arrow3(cr, s, dy, size, a, translate=translate, width=3, end_device_coors=True) 
4326   
4327          if (i == 0 or i == n_arrows) and texts_size == 2: 
4328            texts_coors.append((x, y)) 
4329          elif i == mid and texts_size == 1: 
4330            texts_coors.append((x, y)) 
4331          s += pas 
4332        cr.set_antialias(cairo.ANTIALIAS_NONE) 
4333        cr.move_to(0, dy) 
4334        cr.rel_line_to(l, 0) 
4335        cr.stroke() 
4336        #cr.arc(0, dy, 2, 0, 2*math.pi) 
4337        #cr.stroke() 
4338        xd, yd = cr.user_to_device(l/2, 0) 
4339        cr.restore() 
4340        self.mapping.extend_box(self.id, x, y-25) 
4341        prec_pos = pos 
4342        prec_b, prec_u = b, u 
4343      cr.restore() 
4344      i = 0 
4345      for xd, yd in texts_coors: 
4346        text = texts[i] 
4347        self._draw_arrow_legend(cr, text, xd, yd-15, color=color)  
4348        i += 1

4350 -  def _draw_arc_char2(self, cr, X0, Y0, struct_scale, rdm, name, arc_char, color=None): 

4351      """Dessin d'une charge radiale sur un arc""" 
4352      arrow_size = Const.ARROW_SIZE_MAX 
4353      struct = rdm.struct 
4354      unit_conv = struct.units 
4355      Arc = struct.Curves[name] 
4356      l_arc = Arc.get_size() 
4357      barres = struct.Barres 
4358      angles = struct.Angles 
4359      lengths = struct.Lengths 
4360      points = arc_char.points 
4361      values = arc_char.values 
4362      maxi = 0 
4363      for qx0, q0, qx1, q1 in values.values(): 
4364        if abs(q0) > maxi: 
4365          maxi = abs(q0) 
4366        if abs(q1) > maxi: 
4367          maxi = abs(q1) 
4368      if maxi < 1e-8: # XXX 
4369        return 
4370      arc_barres = arc_char.barres 
4371      if 0. in arc_barres: 
4372        n = 1 
4373      else: 
4374        n = 2 
4375      texts_coors, texts = [], [] 
4376      prec_pos = points[n-1] 
4377      prec_b, prec_u = arc_barres[prec_pos] 
4378      cr.save() 
4379      cr.set_line_width(1) 
4380      if not color is None: 
4381        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
4382      for pos in points[n:]: 
4383        if not pos in arc_barres: 
4384          break 
4385        b, u = arc_barres[pos] 
4386        qx0, q0 = values[prec_pos][2:] 
4387        qx1, q1 = values[pos][0:2] 
4388        # qx0, qx1 nuls !! 
4389        if q0 == 0 and q1 == 0: 
4390          prec_pos = pos 
4391          prec_b, prec_u = b, u 
4392          continue 
4393        if q0 == q1: 
4394          text0 = function.PrintValue(q0, unit_conv['F']) 
4395          texts.append(text0) 
4396          texts_size = 1 
4397        else: 
4398          text0 = function.PrintValue(q0, unit_conv['F']) 
4399          text1 = function.PrintValue(q1, unit_conv['F']) 
4400          texts.append(text0) 
4401          texts.append(text1) 
4402          texts_size = 2 
4403        N0 = barres[prec_b][0] 
4404        if prec_b == b: 
4405          l = u-prec_u 
4406        else: 
4407          l = lengths[prec_b]-prec_u + u 
4408          for barre in range(prec_b+1, b): 
4409            l += lengths[barre] 
4410        n_arrows = int(l*struct_scale / 30) 
4411        if n_arrows == 0: 
4412          pas = l+10 # évite de tracer deux flèches trop proches 
4413        else: 
4414          pas = l/n_arrows 
4415        N0 = barres[prec_b][0] 
4416        x0, y0 = struct.Nodes[N0] 
4417        cr.save() 
4418        cr.translate(X0 + x0, Y0 - y0) 
4419        a = angles[prec_b] 
4420        x =  x0+prec_u*math.cos(a) 
4421        y =  y0+prec_u*math.sin(a) 
4422        translate = q0 >= 0 and True or False 
4423        if q0 < 0: 
4424          da = -1.5707 
4425        else: 
4426          da = 1.5707 
4427        q = abs(arrow_size*q0/maxi) 
4428        device = self._draw_arrow3(cr, x*struct_scale , -y*struct_scale, q, a+da, translate=translate, width=3, end_device_coors=True) 
4429        if texts_size == 2 and not device is None: 
4430          xd, yd = device 
4431          texts_coors.append((xd, yd, prec_b)) 
4432        s = l = lengths[prec_b]-prec_u 
4433        l0 = (pos-prec_pos)*l_arc 
4434        mid_b = int((prec_b+b)/2) 
4435        for barre in range(prec_b+1, b+1): 
4436          dl = lengths[barre] 
4437          if barre == mid_b and texts_size == 1: 
4438            if not device is None: 
4439              xd, yd = device 
4440              texts_coors.append((xd, yd, barre)) 
4441          if s+dl+1e-10 <= pas: # évite un pb numérique 
4442            s += dl 
4443            l += dl 
4444            continue 
4445          du = pas-s 
4446          if du < 0: 
4447            print "Unexpected pas in _draw_arc_char2" 
4448            du = 0 
4449          N0 = barres[barre][0] 
4450          x0, y0 = struct.Nodes[N0] 
4451          a = angles[barre] # prendre moyenne?? 
4452          x = x0+du*math.cos(a) 
4453          y = y0+du*math.sin(a) 
4454          q = q0 + (q1-q0)/l0*l 
4455          translate = q >= 0 and True or False 
4456          if q < 0: 
4457            da = -1.5707 
4458          else: 
4459            da = 1.5707 
4460          q = abs(arrow_size*q/maxi) 
4461          device = self._draw_arrow3(cr, x*struct_scale , -y*struct_scale, q, a+da, translate=translate, width=3, end_device_coors=True)

4463          l += dl 
4464        cr.restore() 
4465        prec_pos = pos 
4466        prec_b, prec_u = b, u 
4467        if texts_size == 2: 
4468          if not device is None: 
4469            xd, yd = device 
4470            texts_coors.append((xd, yd, barre)) 
4471      cr.restore() 
4472      i = 0 
4473      for xd, yd, barre in texts_coors: 
4474        a = -angles[barre] 
4475        text = texts[i] 
4476        self._draw_arrow_legend(cr, text, xd, yd, angle=a, decalage=10, color=color) 
4477        i += 1

4482 -  def _draw_arrow3(self, cr, x, y, size, angle=0, translate=False, width=3, color=None, end_device_coors=False): 

4483      """Dessin d'une flèche au point x, y : si translate, la base de la flèche est positionnée en x, y, sinon pointe flèche en x, y""" 
4484      if angle is None: 
4485        return 
4486   
4487   
4488      #cr.save() 
4489      #cr.arc(x, y, 2, 0, 2*math.pi) 
4490      #cr.stroke() 
4491      #pt = cr.user_to_device(-size, 0) 
4492      #cr.restore() 
4493      #return pt 
4494   
4495   
4496      cr.save() 
4497      cr.set_line_width(width) 
4498      if not color is None: 
4499        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
4500      cr.translate(x, y) 
4501      if not angle == 0: 
4502        cr.rotate(-angle) 
4503      if translate: 
4504        cr.translate(size, 0) 
4505      # axis 
4506      cr.move_to(-size, 0) 
4507      cr.rel_line_to(size-1, 0) 
4508      cr.stroke() 
4509      # arrow 
4510      if size > 9: 
4511        cr.move_to(0, 0) 
4512        cr.rel_line_to(-9, -7) 
4513        cr.rel_line_to(0, 14) 
4514        cr.close_path() 
4515        cr.fill() 
4516        cr.stroke() 
4517      if not end_device_coors: 
4518        cr.restore() 
4519        return 
4520      if translate: 
4521        pt = cr.user_to_device(0, 0) 
4522        cr.restore() 
4523        return pt 
4524      pt = cr.user_to_device(-size, 0) 
4525      cr.restore() 
4526      return pt

4529 -  def _draw_char_bar_fp(self, cr, x0, y0, barre, study, char, struct_scale, nodes=None, color=None): 

4530      """Dessine le chargement de type force dur les barres""" 
4531      rdm = study.rdm 
4532      unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
4533      angleBarre = -rdm.struct.Angles[barre] 
4534      l = rdm.struct.Lengths[barre] 
4535      if nodes is None: 
4536        nodes = rdm.struct.Nodes 
4537      x, y = nodes[rdm.struct.Barres[barre][0]] 
4538      if char == {}: 
4539        return

4541      cr.set_font_size(Const.FONT_SIZE) 
4542      if not color is None: 
4543        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
4544      cr.save() 
4545      cr.translate(x0 + x*struct_scale, y0 - y*struct_scale) 
4546      cr.rotate(angleBarre) 
4547      #cr.scale(struct_scale, struct_scale) 
4548      arrow_size = Const.ARROW_SIZE_MAX 
4549   
4550      legends = [] 
4551      for alpha, char in char.items(): 
4552        u = alpha*l*struct_scale 
4553        fpu = char[0] 
4554        fpv = char[1] 
4555        mirror = fpv >= 0 and True or False 
4556        dy = -5 # décalage de l'axe de la barre 
4557        
4558        mz = char[2] 
4559        norme = (fpu**2+fpv**2)**0.5 
4560        if not norme == 0: 
4561          angle = -function.get_vector_angle((0, 0), char) 
4562          text = function.PrintValue(norme, unit_conv['F']) 
4563          xlegend, ylegend = self._draw_arrow(cr, u, dy, arrow_size, 
4564                  angle, mirror=mirror) 
4565          legends.append((xlegend, ylegend, text)) 
4566        if not mz == 0: 
4567          xlegend, ylegend = self._draw_moment(cr, u, 0, radius=20, end=3.1, middle=True) 
4568          text = function.PrintValue(mz, unit_conv['F']) 
4569          legends.append((xlegend, ylegend, text)) 
4570   
4571      cr.restore()

4573        xd, yd, text = tu 
4574        self.mapping.extend_box(self.id, xd, yd-25) 
4575        self._draw_arrow_legend(cr, text, xd, yd, color=color)  
4576      cr.restore()
