4627 -  def _draw_char_bar_q(self, cr, x0, y0, barre, struct_scale, chars, qmax, study, nodes=None, color=None): 

4628      """Dessine le chargement de type force qu sur la barre""" 
4629      crit = 1e-8 
4630      rdm = study.rdm 
4631      unit_conv = rdm.struct.units 
4632      dim = Const.ARROW_SIZE_MAX # paramètre longueur flèche  
4633      angleBarre = -rdm.struct.Angles[barre] 
4634      l = rdm.struct.Lengths[barre] 
4635      if nodes is None: 
4636        nodes = rdm.struct.Nodes 
4637      x, y = nodes[rdm.struct.Barres[barre][0]] 
4638   
4639      cr.save() 
4640      if not color is None: 
4641        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
4642      cr.translate(x0 + x*struct_scale, y0 - y*struct_scale) 
4643      cr.rotate(angleBarre) 
4644      cr.scale(struct_scale, struct_scale) 
4645      # longueur de la barre en px 
4646      l_px = l * struct_scale 
4647      # arrow width = 0.5px * dim (paramétrable) 
4648      arrow_scale = dim / struct_scale 
4649      # nombre de flèche sur la barre 
4650      n_arrows = int(l_px / (0.5 * dim * 1.5)) + 1 
4651      dy = -5/struct_scale # décalage de l'axe de la barre 
4652   
4653      a0 = 0 
4654      li = chars.keys() 
4655      li.sort() 
4656      for i, a1 in enumerate(li): 
4657        tu = chars[a1] 
4658        if i == 0: 
4659          qu_prec, qv_prec = tu[1] 
4660          a0 = a1 
4661          continue 
4662        qu, qv = tu[0] 
4663        #print "a1=", a1, qv, qv_prec 
4664        dqu = qu-qu_prec 
4665        dqv = qv-qv_prec 
4666        if abs(qv) < crit and abs(qu) < crit and abs(dqv) < crit \ 
4667                          and abs(dqu) < crit: 
4668          qu_prec, qv_prec = tu[1] 
4669          a0 = a1 
4670          continue 
4671        # si qv et qv_prec de signe différent, chercher point nul 
4672        brisure = False 
4673        if qv*qv_prec < 0: 
4674          brisure = True 
4675          x_bris = -qv_prec*(a1-a0)/(qv-qv_prec)+a0 
4676   
4677        # nombre de flèches par intervale 
4678        n = int((a1-a0)*n_arrows) 
4679        # écartement entre flèche 
4680        delta_x = (a1-a0)/(n+1) 
4681   
4682        for j in range(n+2): 
4683          pas = a0 + j*delta_x 
4684          qx = qu_prec + dqu/(n+1)*j 
4685          qy = qv_prec + dqv/(n+1)*j 
4686          # hauteur de flèche variable 
4687          height = (qx**2+qy**2)**0.5 / qmax 
4688          if height < crit: 
4689            height = 0 
4690          mirror = qy >= 0 and True or False 
4691          # attention l'angle peut varier pour chaque flèche si qu diff 0 
4692          angle = function.get_vector_angle((0, 0), (qx, qy)) 
4693          if angle is None: 
4694            angle = 0 # evite un bug 
4695          angle  = -angle 
4696          if mirror: 
4697            angle += math.pi 
4698          self._draw_arrow2(cr, pas*l, dy, struct_scale,  
4699                  arrow_scale, angle, mirror=mirror, height=height, width=1) 
4700          if j == 0: 
4701            text1 = function.PrintValue(height*qmax, unit_conv['F']/unit_conv['L']) 
4702            pt1 = (pas*l, dy, height, angle) 
4703          elif j == n+1: 
4704            text2 = function.PrintValue(height*qmax, unit_conv['F']/unit_conv['L']) 
4705            pt2 = (pas*l, dy, height, angle) 
4706        # dessin ligne attache et de la légende 
4707        if brisure: 
4708          pt3 = (x_bris*l, dy, 0, 0) 
4709          texts = ((text1, 0), ) 
4710          self._draw_qu_attache(cr, pt1, pt3, struct_scale,  
4711                  arrow_scale, texts=texts) 
4712          texts = ((text2, 1), ) 
4713          self._draw_qu_attache(cr, pt3, pt2, struct_scale,  
4714                  arrow_scale, texts=texts) 
4715        else: 
4716          if text1 == text2: 
4717            texts = ((text1, 2), ) 
4718          else: 
4719            texts = ((text1, 0), (text2,1)) 
4720          self._draw_qu_attache(cr, pt1, pt2, struct_scale,  
4721                  arrow_scale, texts=texts) 
4722        a0 = a1 
4723        qu_prec, qv_prec = tu[1] 
4724   
4725      cr.restore()

4727 -  def _draw_qu_attache(self, cr, pt1, pt2, struct_scale, arrow_scale, texts=None, color=None): 

4728      """Dessin de la ligne d'attache d'une charge qu et de sa légende 
4729      height : hauteur de la flèche entre 0!! et 1""" 
4730      def show_text(x1, x2, y, height1, height2, angle1, angle2, text, pos): 
4731        if pos == 0: 
4732          x = x1 
4733          height = height1 
4734          angle = angle1 
4735        elif pos== 1: 
4736          x = x2 
4737          height = height2 
4738          angle = angle2 
4739        else: 
4740          x = (x1+x2)/2 
4741          angle = (angle1+angle2)/2 
4742          height = height2 
4743        cr.save() 
4744        cr.translate(x, y) 
4745        cr.rotate(angle) 
4746        cr.move_to(height, 0) 
4747        pt = cr.user_to_device(height, 0) 
4748        cr.save() 
4749        cr.rotate(-angle) 
4750        x_bearing, y_bearing, w, h = cr.text_extents(text)[:4] 
4751        cr.rel_move_to(-w/2, -h) 
4752        cr.show_text(text) 
4753        cr.restore() 
4754        cr.restore() 
4755        return pt 

4756   
4757      cr.save() 
4758      if not color is None: 
4759        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
4760   
4761      cr.save() 
4762      cr.set_line_width(1/struct_scale) 
4763      x1, y, height1, angle1 = pt1 
4764      cr.translate(x1, y) 
4765      cr.rotate(angle1) 
4766      height1 = -height1*arrow_scale 
4767      cr.move_to(height1, 0) 
4768      cr.restore() 
4769   
4770      cr.save() 
4771      cr.set_line_width(1/struct_scale) 
4772      x2, y, height2, angle2 = pt2 
4773      cr.translate(x2, y) 
4774      cr.rotate(angle2) 
4775      height2 = -height2*arrow_scale 
4776      cr.line_to(height2, 0) 
4777      cr.stroke() 
4778      cr.restore() 
4779   
4780      if texts: 
4781        cr.set_font_size(Const.FONT_SIZE/struct_scale) 
4782         
4783        if len(texts) == 1: 
4784          text, pos = texts[0] 
4785          xd, yd = show_text(x1, x2, y, height1, height2, angle1, angle2, text, pos) 
4786          self.mapping.extend_box(self.id, xd, yd-25) 
4787        else: 
4788          text1, pos1 = texts[0] 
4789          xd, yd = show_text(x1, x2, y, height1, height2, angle1, angle2, text1, pos1) 
4790          self.mapping.extend_box(self.id, xd, yd-25)

5049 -  def _get_combi_view1(self, rdm): 

5050      """Retourne une vue de l'état des boutons des combinaisons du type [(0/1 inactif/actif, 0/1 insensible/sensible)] # attention doit être un tuple 
5051      Mode checkbutton""" 
5052      s_cases = self.s_cases 
5053      try: 
5054        n_cases = rdm.n_cases 
5055        n_chars = rdm.n_chars 
5056      except AttributeError: 
5057        n_cases = 0 
5058        n_chars = 0 
5059      try: 
5060        errorcases = rdm.char_error 
5061      except AttributeError: 
5062        errorcases = [] 
5063      view = [] 
5064      for i in range(n_cases): 
5065        if i in s_cases: 
5066          view.append((1, 1)) 
5067          continue 
5068        if i in errorcases: 
5069          view.append((0, 0)) 
5070          continue 
5071        view.append((0, 1)) 
5072      sens = 1 
5073      if errorcases: 
5074        sens = 0 
5075      for i in range(n_cases, n_chars): 
5076        if sens == 0: 
5077          view.append((0, 0)) 
5078        elif i in s_cases: 
5079          view.append((1, 1)) 
5080        else: 
5081          view.append((0, 1)) 
5082      return view

5125 -  def _get_combi_view2(self, rdm, show_all=True): 

5126      """Retourne une vue de l'état des boutons des combinaisons du type [(0/1 inactif/actif, 0/1 insensible/sensible)] # attention doit être un tuple 
5127      Mode radiobutton""" 
5128      try: 
5129        n_cases = rdm.n_cases 
5130        n_chars = rdm.n_chars 
5131      except AttributeError: 
5132        n_cases = 0 
5133        n_chars = 0

5136      except AttributeError: 
5137        errorcases = [] 
5138

5140      combi_error = False 
5141      if n_errors > 0: 
5142        combi_error = True 
5143      s_case = self.s_case 
5144  # tester 
5145      if self.status == 2:  
5146        show_all = True # on montre les chargements

5152        combi_error = False

5154        return [(0, 0)]*n_chars

5157        for i in range(n_cases): 
5158          if not i in errorcases: 
5159            s_case = i 
5160            break 
5161   
5162      view = [(0, 1)]*n_chars 
5163      view[s_case] = (1, 1) 
5164   
5165      if not show_all: 
5166        for i in range(n_chars): 
5167          if i in errorcases or (combi_error and i >= n_cases): 
5168            view[i] = (0, 0) 
5169      return view

5261        angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
5262        l = struct.Lengths[barre]

5272            text = PrintValue(val, unit_conv) 
5273            dy = self._get_text_pos(val) 
5274            x, y = cr.user_to_device(u, -val+dy/chart_scale) 
5275            if pos == 2: # provisoire 
5276              pos -= 2 
5277              auto = False 
5278            else: 
5279              auto = True 
5280            di2[u].append([(0., val), int(x), int(y), angle, pos, auto]) 
5281        cr.restore() 
5282        di[barre] = di2 
5283      self.mapping.set_curve_values(self, di, id)

5286 -  def _get_influ_data(self, rdm, bars): 

5287      """Calcule les données pour toutes les lignes d'influence afin de pouvoir en déduire le maximum. Retourne les béziers, les valeurs caractéristiques et le maxi""" 
5288      data = {} 
5289      values = {} 
5290      maxi0 = 0 
5291      try: 
5292        user_values = self.user_values[self.status] 
5293      except KeyError: 
5294        user_values = {} 
5295      for obj in self.influ_list.values(): 
5296        id = obj.id 
5297        try: 
5298          c_user_values = user_values[id] 
5299        except KeyError: 
5300          c_user_values = {} 
5301        data[id] = {} 
5302        status = obj.status 
5303        elem = obj.elem 
5304        u = obj.u 
5305        for barre in bars: 
5306          points = rdm.InfluBarre(barre, elem, u, status) 
5307          data[id][barre] = points 
5308        values[id] = copy.copy(rdm.bar_values) # !! effet de bord 
5309   
5310        for barre in c_user_values: 
5311          are_deleted = [] 
5312          for pos in c_user_values[barre]: 
5313            if not barre in values[id]: 
5314              continue 
5315            if not pos in values[id][barre]: 
5316              if len(c_user_values[barre][pos]) == 2: 
5317                are_deleted.append(pos) 
5318                continue 
5319              l = rdm.struct.Lengths[barre] 
5320              val = rdm.ValueLigneInf(barre, pos/l, elem, u, status) 
5321              values[id][barre][pos/l] = {2: val} 
5322          for val in are_deleted: 
5323            del(c_user_values[barre][val]) # suppression valeurs devenues inutiles 
5324   
5325        for di in rdm.bar_values.values(): 
5326          for tu in di.values(): 
5327            for val in tu.values(): 
5328              if abs(val) > maxi0: 
5329                maxi0 = abs(val) 
5330      return data, values, maxi0

5872 -  def _set_soll_values(self, cr, rdm, x1, y1, struct_scale, chart_scale, n_case, Char, barre):

5874      if not (n_case == self.s_curve or n_case in self.s_values): 
5875        self.mapping.set_curve_values(self, {}, n_case) 
5876        return

5878      units = struct.units

5880      #  unit_conv = units['L']*units['F'] 
5881      #else: 
5882      #  unit_conv = units['F'] 
5883      angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
5884      l = struct.Lengths[barre] 
5885      cr.save() 
5886      cr.translate(self.x0 + x1*struct_scale, self.y0 - y1*struct_scale) 
5887      if not angle == 0: 
5888        cr.rotate(angle) 
5889      cr.scale(struct_scale, chart_scale)

5891        user_values = self.user_values[self.status][n_case] 
5892      except KeyError: 
5893        user_values = {}

5896      bar_values = rdm.bar_values[barre] 
5897      self._get_user_values(rdm, Char, barre, user_values, bar_values, l) 
5898      for u, data in bar_values.items(): 
5899        u = u*l 
5900        di[barre][u] = [] 
5901        for pos, val in data.items(): 
5902          #text = function.PrintValue(val, unit_conv) 
5903          dy = self._get_text_pos(val) 
5904          x, y = cr.user_to_device(u, -val+dy/chart_scale) 
5905          if pos == 2: # provisoire 
5906            pos -= 2 
5907            auto = False 
5908          else: 
5909            auto = True 
5910          di[barre][u].append([(0., val), int(x), int(y), angle, pos, auto]) 
5911      cr.restore()

5915      """Prépare les données pour les légendes des courbes""" 
5916      struct = rdm.struct 
5917      unit_conv = struct.units['L'] 
5918      self._delete_node_val(rdm) 
5919      angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
5920      l = struct.Lengths[barre] 
5921      cr.save() 
5922      cr.translate(self.x0 + x1*struct_scale, self.y0 - y1*struct_scale) 
5923      if not angle == 0: 
5924        cr.rotate(angle) 
5925      cr.scale(struct_scale, chart_scale) 
5926      try: 
5927        user_values = self.user_values[self.status][n_case] 
5928      except KeyError: 
5929        user_values = {} 
5930      di = {barre: {}} 
5931      bar_values = rdm.bar_values[barre] 
5932      self._get_user_values(rdm, Char, barre, user_values, bar_values, l) 
5933      for u, data in bar_values.items(): 
5934        u = u*l 
5935        di[barre][u] = [] 
5936        for pos, val in data.items(): 
5937          valx = val[0]*chart_scale / struct_scale 
5938          valy = val[1] 
5939          text = function.PrintValue(valy, unit_conv) 
5940          dy = self._get_text_pos(valy) 
5941          x, y = cr.user_to_device(u+valx, -valy+dy/chart_scale) 
5942          if pos == 2: # provisoire 
5943            pos -= 2 
5944            auto = False 
5945          else: 
5946            auto = True 
5947          di[barre][u].append([val, int(x), int(y), angle, pos, auto]) 
5948      cr.restore() 
5949      self.mapping.set_curve_values(self, di, n_case) 

5950

5953 -  def _draw_one_bar(self, cr, struct, scale, barre, width=1, color=None, fill=False): 

5954      """Dessine une seule barre de la structure à partir du milieu de celle-ci pour le mode par barre""" 
5955      angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
5956      l = struct.Lengths[barre] 
5957      cr.save() 
5958      if not color is None: 
5959        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
5960      cr.translate(self.x0 , self.y0) 
5961      if not angle == 0: 
5962        cr.rotate(angle) 
5963      cr.scale(scale, scale) 
5964      cr.set_line_width(width / scale) 
5965   
5966      cr.move_to(-l/2, 0) 
5967      cr.line_to(l/2, 0) 
5968      cr.stroke() 
5969   
5970      # mapping 
5971      m_points = {} 
5972      node1 = struct.Barres[barre][0] 
5973      node2 = struct.Barres[barre][1] 
5974      x1, y1 = cr.user_to_device(-l/2, 0) 
5975      self.N1 = (x1, y1, node1) 
5976      m_points[node1] = (x1, y1) 
5977      x2, y2 = cr.user_to_device(l/2, 0) 
5978      self.N2 = (x2, y2, node2) 
5979      m_points[node2] = (x2, y2) 
5980      m_bars = {barre: (x1, y1, x2, y2)} 
5981      if fill: 
5982        m = 50 
5983        w, h = abs(x2-x1)+2*m, abs(y2-y1)+2*m 
5984        box = (min(x1, x2)-m, min(y1, y2)-m, w, h) 
5985        self.mapping.set_mapping_bars(self.id, m_points, m_bars, box) 
5986      options = self.options 
5987      if options.get('Barre'): 
5988        self._draw_bar_name(cr, 0, 0, barre, 0, scale) 
5989      if options.get('Node'): 
5990        self._draw_node_name(cr, -l/2, 0, node1, scale, -angle) 
5991        self._draw_node_name(cr, l/2, 0, node2, scale, -angle) 
5992      if options.get('Axis'): 
5993        self._draw_axis(cr, 0, 0, 0, scale) 
5994   
5995      cr.restore()

6121 -  def _draw_section(self, cr, struct, x, y, barre, end=False, color=None): 

6122      """Dessine une extrémité de barre : x, y sont les décalages par rapport au milieu de la barre.""" 
6123      cr.save() 
6124      if not color is None: 
6125        self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, color) 
6126      cr.set_line_width(2) 
6127      angle = -struct.Angles[barre] 
6128      if end: 
6129        angle += math.pi 
6130      cr.translate(x, y) 
6131      cr.rotate(angle) 
6132      h = 20 
6133      l = 15 
6134      cr.move_to(l, -h) 
6135      cr.rel_line_to(-l, 0) 
6136      cr.rel_line_to(0, 2*h) 
6137      cr.rel_line_to(l, 0) 
6138      cr.stroke() 
6139      cr.set_line_width(1) 
6140      for i in range(3): 
6141        cr.move_to(l, h*(-0.8+2.*i/3)) 
6142        cr.rel_line_to(-l, 4) 
6143        cr.stroke() 
6144      cr.restore()

6404 -  def _draw_one_axis(self, cr, x, y, size, angle): 

6405      """Dessine un axe de centre x, y avec flèche""" 
6406      cr.save() 
6407      cr.translate(x, y) 
6408      cr.rotate(angle) 
6409      cr.set_line_width(1) 
6410      a = 6 # arrow 
6411      cr.move_to(0, 0) 
6412      cr.rel_line_to(size, 0) 
6413      cr.stroke()

6415      cr.rel_line_to(a+1, a) 
6416      cr.rel_line_to(-a-1, a) 
6417      cr.close_path() 
6418      cr.fill() 
6419      cr.stroke() 
6420      cr.restore()

6422 -  def _draw_sigma(self, cr, dec_y, factor_C): 

6423      """Dessine les flèches de contrainte""" 
6424      if self.chart_scale is None or math.isinf(self.chart_scale): 
6425        return 
6426      x_axe, y_axe = self.x0, self.y0 
6427      H, v = self.H, self.v # caractéristiques section droite 
6428      s1, s2 = self.sig_inf, self.sig_sup 
6429      cr.save() 
6430      cr.set_source_rgb(1, 0, 0) 
6431      y = v 
6432      n = 8 # n arrows 
6433      dy = H / n 
6434      struct_scale = self.struct_scale*self.struct_zoom 
6435      chart_scale = self.chart_scale*self.chart_zoom 
6436      sig0 = s2*chart_scale 
6437      for i in range(n+1): 
6438        dsig = (s1-s2)*i*dy/H*chart_scale 
6439        sig = dsig+sig0 
6440        self._draw_arrow(cr, x_axe, sig, y_axe-y*struct_scale)

6444      cr.restore()

6446 -  def _draw_values(self, cr, dec_y, factor_C):

6450      text1 = function.PrintValue(s1, factor_C) 
6451      text2 = function.PrintValue(s2, factor_C) 
6452      cr.save() 
6453      cr.translate(self.x0, self.y0+dec_y) 
6454      x_bearing, y_bearing, width, height = cr.text_extents(text1)[:4] 
6455      dx = s1 > 0 and 1 or -width 
6456      cr.move_to(s1*chart_scale+dx, 20) 
6457      cr.show_text(text1) 
6458      cr.restore() 
6459      cr.save() 
6460      cr.translate(self.x0, self.y0-self.height+dec_y) 
6461      x_bearing, y_bearing, width, height = cr.text_extents(text2)[:4] 
6462      dx = s2 > 0 and 1 or -width 
6463      cr.move_to(s2*chart_scale+dx, -20+height) 
6464      cr.show_text(text2) 
6465      cr.restore() 
6466

6468      if abs(sG) > max(abs(s1), abs(s2))/1e4: 
6469        textG = function.PrintValue(sG, factor_C) 
6470        cr.save()

6479 -  def _draw_attache(self, cr, dec_y): 

6480      """Dessine la ligne qui relie sigma sup et inf""" 
6481      chart_scale = self.chart_scale*self.chart_zoom 
6482      s1, s2 = self.sig_inf, self.sig_sup 
6483      H, v = self.H, self.v # caractéristiques section droite 
6484      cr.save() 
6485      cr.set_line_width(1) 
6486      px = max(cr.device_to_user_distance(1, 1)) 
6487      cr.set_dash([3 * px], 0) 
6488      cr.translate(self.x0, self.y0 + dec_y) 
6489      cr.move_to(s1*chart_scale, 0) 
6490      cr.line_to(s2*chart_scale, -self.height)

6495 -  def _draw_arrow(self, cr, x0, sig, y): 

6496      """Dessine une flèche de contrainte""" 
6497      #print "_draw_arrow", x0, sig, y 
6498      if abs(sig) < 2: 
6499        return 
6500      cr.save() 
6501      cr.set_line_width(1) 
6502      cr.translate(x0, y) 
6503      dx = sig < 0 and -2 or 2 
6504      cr.move_to(dx, 0) 
6505      cr.rel_line_to(sig-2*dx, 0) 
6506      cr.stroke() 
6507   
6508      if abs(sig) <= 5: 
6509        cr.restore() 
6510        return 
6511   
6512      if sig > 0: 
6513        d = 5 
6514      else: 
6515        d = -5 
6516      # arrow 
6517      cr.move_to(sig-dx, 0) 
6518      cr.rel_line_to(-d, -d) 
6519      cr.rel_line_to(0, 2*d) 
6520      cr.close_path() 
6521      cr.fill() 
6522      cr.stroke() 
6523      cr.restore()

6548 -  def get_axe_x(self, s1, s2): 

6549      """Retourne les largeurs du graphe côté négatif et positif""" 
6550      mini = 50 
6551      scale = self.chart_scale*self.chart_zoom 
6552      if s1*s2 < 0: 
6553        if s1 < 0: 
6554          dx1 = -s1*scale 
6555          dx2 = s2*scale 
6556        else: 
6557          dx1 = -s2*scale 
6558          dx2 = s1*scale 
6559      elif s1 < 0: # s1 et s2 < 0 
6560        dx1 = -(min(s1, s2))*scale 
6561        dx2 = mini 
6562      else: # s1 et s2 > 0 
6563        dx1 = mini 
6564        dx2 = max(s1, s2)*scale 
6565      return max(dx1, mini), max(dx2, mini)

6585 -  def get_max_scale(self, value, study):

6588      scale = self.struct_scale*self.struct_zoom 
6589      w, h = self.width, self.height 
6590      coef = value/scale 
6591      max_size = max(w, h)*coef 
6592      if max_size <= size: 
6593        return True 
6594      return False

6596 -  def dim_chart_scale(self, size): 

6597      """Redimensionne l'échelle du graphe si trop grande ou trop petite""" 
6598      if self.chart_scale is None: 
6599        return

6601      maxi = max(abs(s1), abs(s2)) 
6602      if maxi*self.chart_scale*self.chart_zoom > size: 
6603        self.chart_scale = size/maxi/self.chart_zoom 
6604      elif maxi*self.chart_scale*self.chart_zoom < size/10: 
6605        self.chart_scale = size/10/maxi/self.chart_zoom

6992 -  def remove_drawing(self, drawing): 

6993      """Supprime un drawing""" 
6994      is_changed = False 
6995      if drawing is self.active_drawing: 
6996        is_changed = True 
6997      self.is_selected = False 
6998      for key in drawing.childs: 
6999        is_changed = True 
7000        self.mapping.remove_map(key) 
7001        del(self.drawings[key])

7003      id_study = drawing.id_study 
7004      if not drawing.parent is None: 
7005        parent = drawing.parent 
7006        del(parent.childs[drawing_id]) 
7007        parent.del_patterns()

7009      self.mapping.remove_map(drawing_id) 
7010      self._remove_study(id_study) 
7011      if is_changed: 
7012        self.active_drawing = self._get_first_drawing() 
7013

7015      self.remove_tools_box() 
7016      self.remove_entry_box()

7034 -  def add_study(self, path, options): 

7035      """Ajoute une étude""" 
7036      study = Study(path) 
7037      id = study.id 
7038      if study.rdm.status == -1: # xml error 
7039        return study, None 
7040      prefs = self.get_drawings_prefs(study.rdm.struct, options) 
7041      drawings = [] 
7042      for pref in prefs: 
7043        drawing = Drawing(self.mapping, id, pref) 
7044        drawing.set_cases(study.rdm) 
7045        self.drawings[drawing.id] = drawing 
7046        drawings.append(drawing) 
7047        if 'b_child' in pref: 
7048          bdrawing = BarreDrawing(self.mapping, id, drawing, pref['b_child']) 
7049          self.drawings[bdrawing.id] = bdrawing 
7050        if 'c_child' in pref: 
7051          cdrawing = CharDrawing(self.mapping, id, drawing, pref['c_child']) 
7052          self.drawings[cdrawing.id] = cdrawing 
7053        if 'sigma_child' in pref: 
7054          for i, elem in enumerate(pref['sigma_child']): 
7055            sdrawing = SigmaDrawing(self.mapping, id, drawing, pref['sigma_child'][i]) 
7056            self.drawings[sdrawing.id] = sdrawing 
7057      self.studies[id] = study 
7058      # ajout de l'attribut pour les lignes d'influence 
7059      for drawing in drawings: 
7060        if drawing.status == 8: 
7061          study.influ_rdm = classRdm.Influ_Structure(study.rdm.struct) 
7062          break 
7063      try: 
7064        self.active_drawing = drawings[0] 
7065      except IndexError: 
7066        self.active_drawing = None 
7067      return study, drawings

7121 -  def get_drawings_prefs(self, struct, options): 

7122      """Lit les préférences du ou des dessins dans le fichier xml""" 
7123      prefs = [] 
7124      XML = struct.XML 
7125      try: 
7126        elem = XML.getiterator('draw')[0] 
7127      except IndexError: 
7128        di = {'Title': options['Title'], 'Barre': options['Barre'], 'Node': options['Node'], 'Axis': options['Axis'], 'Series': options['Series']} 
7129        prefs.append(di) 
7130        return prefs 
7131      nodes = elem.getiterator('drawing') 
7132      if len(nodes) == 0: 
7133        di = {'Title': options['Title'], 'Barre': options['Barre'], 'Node': options['Node'], 'Axis': options['Axis'], 'Series': options['Series']} 
7134        prefs.append(di) 
7135        return prefs 
7136      for xml in nodes: 
7137        di = {} 
7138        self._set_option_prefs(xml, di, options) 
7139        try: 
7140          di['x0'] = float(xml.get("x0")) 
7141          di['y0'] = float(xml.get("y0")) 
7142          di['struct_scale'] = float(xml.get("scale")) 
7143        except (TypeError, ValueError): 
7144          continue 
7145        status = xml.get("status") 
7146        if not status is None: 
7147          di['status'] = status 
7148        values = xml.get("values") 
7149        if not values is None: 
7150          di['values'] = values 
7151        val = xml.get("title") 
7152        if not val is None: 
7153          val = val.split(',') 
7154          di['title'] = val 
7155        val = xml.get("scale_pos") 
7156        if not val is None: 
7157          val = val.split(',') 
7158          di['scale_pos'] = val 
7159        val = xml.get("series") 
7160        if not val is None: 
7161          val = val.split(',') 
7162          del(val[0]) 
7163          di['series_pos'] = val 
7164        val = xml.get("influ_bars") 
7165        if not val is None: 
7166          val = val.split(',') 
7167          for i, elem in enumerate(val): 
7168            if elem[0] == '*': # Conversion en entier pour les super barres 
7169              elem = int(elem[1:]) 
7170              val[i] = elem 
7171          di['s_influ_bars'] = val 
7172        childs = xml.getiterator('b_child') 
7173        if len(childs) == 1: 
7174          child = childs[0] 
7175          di1 = {} 
7176          error = False 
7177          try: 
7178            di1['x0'] = float(child.get("x0")) 
7179            di1['y0'] = float(child.get("y0")) 
7180            di1['struct_scale'] = float(child.get("scale")) 
7181          except (TypeError, ValueError): 
7182            error = True 
7183          val = child.get("status") 
7184          if not val is None: 
7185            di1['status'] = val 
7186          val = child.get("bar") 
7187          if not val is None: 
7188            if val in struct.UserBars: 
7189              di1['bar'] = val 
7190            else: 
7191              try: 
7192                val = int(val) 
7193                if not val in struct.Barres: 
7194                  error = True 
7195                di1['bar'] = val 
7196              except ValueError: 
7197                error = True 
7198          val = child.get("title") 
7199          if not val is None: 
7200            val = val.split(',')

7202          val = child.get("scale_pos") 
7203          if not val is None: 
7204            val = val.split(',') 
7205            di1['scale_pos'] = val 
7206          self._set_option_prefs(xml, di1, options) 
7207

7209          if not values is None:

7211          if not error: 
7212            di['b_child'] = di1 
7213        childs = xml.getiterator('c_child') 
7214        if len(childs) == 1: 
7215          child = childs[0] 
7216          di1 = {} 
7217          error = False 
7218          try: 
7219            di1['x0'] = float(child.get("x0"))

7223            error = True

7271      self._ini_area() 
7272      #sw.add(self.area) 
7273      sw.add_with_viewport(self.area) 
7274      sw.show()

7277 -  def _ini_area(self):

7280      self.area.modify_bg(gtk.STATE_NORMAL, self._fg.get_white_color())

7285                  | gtk.gdk.KEY_PRESS_MASK 
7286                  | gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_HINT_MASK)

7292 -  def _get_unit(self): 

7293      """Retourne l'unité""" 
7294      unit = self.unit_conv['F'] 
7295      if unit == 1: text = 'N' 
7296      elif unit == 10: text = 'daN' 
7297      elif unit == 1000: text = 'kN' 
7298      return text

7303 -  def expose_event(self, area, event):  

7304      """Fonction exécutée au démarrage du drawingarea  
7305      et chaque redimensionnement de celui-ci - Les dessins devrait être réalisés dans cette méthode""" 
7306      try: 
7307        x, y, width, height = event.area # is gtk.Rectangle 
7308      except AttributeError: 
7309        x, y, width, height = event 
7310      #print "expose_event", x, y, width, height 
7311      cr = area.bin_window.cairo_create() 
7312      cr.rectangle( x, y, width, height) 
7313      cr.clip() 
7314      cr.set_source_surface(self.surface, 0, 0) 
7315      cr.paint() 

7316      
7317  # le dessin se fait en deux étapes: 
7318  # D'abord on dessine sur une source en mémoire dans la méthode configure_event 
7319  # puis on dessin de la source sur le widget dans expose_event

7321 -  def configure_event(self, widget, event=None, rect=None): 

7322      """Fonction de configuration du drawing_area""" 
7323      #print "classDrawing::configure_event", widget.size_request() 
7324      sw = self.sw 
7325      sw_w = int(sw.get_hadjustment().page_size) 
7326      sw_h = int(sw.get_vadjustment().page_size) 
7327      w, h = widget.size_request() 
7328      if w == 0 and h == 0: 
7329        w = widget.allocation.width 
7330        h = widget.allocation.height 
7331        widget.set_size_request(w, h) 
7332        self.area_w, self.area_h = w, h 
7333        return 
7334      rect = widget.get_allocation() 
7335      w_alloc, h_alloc = rect.width, rect.height 
7336      if w < w_alloc or h < h_alloc: # fullscreen 
7337        w, h = max(w, w_alloc), max(h, h_alloc) 
7338        widget.set_size_request(w, h) 
7339        self.area_w, self.area_h = w, h 
7340        return 
7341      w, h = min(w, 2000), min(h, 2000) # size limitation 
7342      w = max(w, sw_w) 
7343      h = max(h, sw_h) 
7344      self.area_w, self.area_h = w, h 
7345      #if hasattr(self, 'surface'): 
7346      #  return 
7347      #self.new_surface(w, h) 
7348   
7349      if not hasattr(self, 'surface'): 
7350        self.new_surface(w, h) 
7351      cr = self.cr 
7352      #  
7353      if not rect is None: 
7354        x, y, w, h = rect 
7355        cr.rectangle(x, y, w, h) 
7356        cr.clip() 
7357        cr.save() 
7358        cr.rectangle(x, y, w, h) 
7359        cr.set_source_rgb(1, 1, 1) 
7360        cr.fill() 
7361        cr.restore() 
7362      active = self.active_drawing 
7363      drawings = self.drawings 
7364      n_drawing = len(drawings) 
7365      studies = self.studies 
7366      ids = drawings.keys() 
7367      ids.sort(reverse=True) 
7368      for id in ids: # on parcours en sens des id décroissants pour dessiner  
7369        # à coup sûr le p_barre 
7370        drawing = drawings[id] 
7371        study = studies[drawing.id_study] 
7372        if not hasattr(drawing, "x0"): 
7373          drawing._adjust_drawing(study.rdm.struct, sw_w, sw_h) 
7374        # si p_struct n'existe pas on redessine tout 
7375        if not hasattr(drawing, "p_struct"): 
7376          drawing.expose_drawing(cr, study) 
7377        if n_drawing > 1: 
7378          tag = drawing is active 
7379          self.draw_is_selected(drawing, tag) 
7380        drawing.paint_drawing(cr) 

7381   

7382 -  def do_new_drawing(self, new_pattern): 

7383      """Génère un nouveau tracé, si new_pattern : régénère le pattern correspondant""" 
7384      #print "do_new_drawing", new_pattern 
7385      drawings = self.drawings 
7386      a_d = self.active_drawing 
7387      study = self.studies[a_d.id_study] 
7388      self.new_surface(self.area_w, self.area_h) 
7389      cr = self.cr 
7390      if new_pattern: 
7391        affected_ids = [a_d.id] 
7392        affected_ids.extend(a_d.childs) 
7393        if not a_d.parent is None: 
7394          affected_ids.append(a_d.parent.id) 
7395        for key in affected_ids: 
7396          d = drawings[key] 
7397          d.update_drawing_data() 
7398          d.del_patterns() 
7399        for key in affected_ids: 
7400          d = drawings[key] 
7401          d.expose_drawing(cr, study) 
7402   
7403        x0, y0, w, h = a_d.mapping.box[a_d.id] 
7404        a_d.expose_drawing(cr, study) 
7405        # vérification de la nouvelle taille 
7406        x0, y0, w, h = a_d.mapping.box[a_d.id] 
7407        if x0 < 0: 
7408          area_w = x0 + w 
7409          x0 = 0 
7410        else: 
7411          area_w = w 
7412        if y0 < 0: 
7413          area_h = y0 + h 
7414          y0 = 0 
7415        else: 
7416          area_h = h 
7417        has_changed = False 
7418        if self.area_w < area_w: 
7419          self.area_w = int(area_w) 
7420          has_changed = True 
7421        if self.area_h < area_h: 
7422          self.area_h = int(area_h) 
7423          has_changed = True 
7424        if has_changed: 
7425          self.del_surface() 
7426          a_d.del_patterns() # on force un nouveau expose_drawing 
7427          self.area.set_size_request(self.area_w, self.area_h) 
7428          return 
7429      n_drawing = len(self.drawings) 
7430      if n_drawing > 1: 
7431        ids = drawings.keys() 
7432        ids.sort(reverse=True) 
7433        for id in ids: # on parcours en sens des id décroissants pour dessiner  
7434        # à coup sûr le p_barre 
7435          drawing = drawings[id] 
7436          tag = drawing is a_d 
7437          self.draw_is_selected(drawing, tag) 
7438      self.paint_all_struct(cr, a_d) 
7439      self.area.queue_draw()

7442 -  def draw_is_selected(self, drawing, is_active): 

7443      """Dessine le repère indiquant quelle est le dessin actif""" 
7444      cr = self.cr 
7445      if is_active: 
7446        cr.push_group() 
7447        surface = cairo.ImageSurface.create_from_png("glade/default.png") 
7448        x, y, w, h = self.mapping.box[drawing.id] 
7449        cr.set_source_surface(surface, x+5, y+h-22) 
7450        cr.paint() 
7451        drawing.p_select = cr.pop_group() 
7452      else: 
7453        try: 
7454          del(drawing.p_select) 
7455        except AttributeError: 
7456          pass 

7457   

7458 -  def _resize_drawing(self, study, drawing, coef): 

7459      sw = self.sw 
7460      # partie visible de la sw 
7461      sw_w = int(sw.get_hadjustment().page_size) 
7462      sw_h = int(sw.get_vadjustment().page_size) 
7463      struct = study.rdm.struct 
7464      scale, zoom = drawing.struct_scale, drawing.struct_zoom 
7465      area_w, area_h = self.area.size_request() 
7466      type1 = drawing.get_drawing_type() 
7467      if type1 == "bar": 
7468        barre = drawing.s_bar 
7469        width, height = struct.Lengths[barre], 0 
7470        margin = Const.AREA_MARGIN 
7471        if width*scale*zoom + 2*margin < sw_w and height*scale*zoom + 2*margin < sw_h: 
7472          drawing.struct_zoom = zoom * coef 
7473        self.configure_event(self.area) 
7474        self.area.queue_draw() 
7475        return 
7476      if type1 == "sigma": 
7477  # finir tester utilité 
7478        drawing.struct_zoom = zoom * coef 
7479        self.configure_event(self.area) 
7480        self.area.queue_draw() 
7481        return 
7482      if type1 == "parent": 
7483        width, height = struct.width, struct.height 
7484        struct_w, struct_h = scale*width*zoom, scale*height*zoom 
7485        Lmargin, Umargin = area_w - struct_w, area_h - struct_h 
7486        w, h = int(Lmargin + struct_w * coef), int(Umargin + struct_h * coef) 
7487        drawing.struct_zoom = zoom * coef 
7488        dy = h-area_h 
7489        if dy > 0: 
7490          # on décale en y l'origine du tracé 
7491          drawing.y0 += h-area_h 
7492        if area_w == w and area_h == h: 
7493          self.configure_event(self.area) 
7494          self.area.queue_draw() 
7495        elif sw_w < w or sw_h < h: 
7496          self.area.set_size_request(w, h) 
7497        else: 
7498          self.configure_event(self.area) 
7499          self.area.queue_draw() 

7500   
7501   
7502   

7503 -  def _draw_box(self, cr, x, y, w, h): 

7504      """Dessine le contour d'un dessin""" 
7505      #print " _draw_box", x, y, w, h 
7506      cr.save() 
7507      cr.set_line_width(1) 
7508      cr.set_antialias(cairo.ANTIALIAS_NONE) 
7509      self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, 'blue') 
7510      px = max(cr.device_to_user_distance(1, 1)) 
7511      cr.set_dash([2 * px], 0) 
7512      cr.move_to(x, y) 
7513      cr.rel_line_to(w, 0) 
7514      cr.rel_line_to(0, h) 
7515      cr.rel_line_to(-w, 0) 
7516      cr.rel_line_to(0, -h) 
7517      cr.stroke() 
7518      draw_square(cr, x, y) 
7519      draw_square(cr, x+w, y) 
7520      draw_square(cr, x, y+h) 
7521      draw_square(cr, x+w, y+h) 
7522      cr.restore() 

7523   

7524 -  def _paint_serie(self, alpha=1): 

7525      cr.set_source(self.p_serie) 
7526      cr.paint_with_alpha(alpha) 

7527   

7528 -  def _paint_moving_info(self, cr, moving_drawing, info_id, x=0, y=0, alpha=1.): 

7529      for drawing in self.drawings.values(): 
7530        if drawing is moving_drawing: 
7531          cr.save() 
7532          cr.translate(x, y) 
7533          drawing.paint_info(cr, info_id, alpha) 
7534          cr.restore() 
7535          drawing.paint_drawing4(cr, 1.) 
7536        else: 
7537          drawing.paint_drawing(cr, alpha)

7539 -  def _paint_moving_struct(self, cr, moving_drawing, x=0, y=0, alpha=1.): 

7540      """Redessine toutes les structures, y compris celle en mouvement de DND""" 
7541      for drawing in self.drawings.values(): 
7542        if drawing is moving_drawing: 
7543          cr.save() 
7544          cr.translate(x, y)

7586 -  def _area_barre_info(self, barre, drawing): 

7587      """Retourne les informations sur la barre choisie""" 
7588      barre = barre.name 
7589      study = self.studies[drawing.id_study] 
7590      rdm = study.rdm 
7591      struct = study.rdm.struct 
7592      #crit = 1e-10 
7593      crit = max(struct.width, struct.height)/1e8 
7594      unit_L = study.get_unit_name('L') 
7595      unit_S = study.get_unit_name('S') 
7596      unit_I = study.get_unit_name('I') 
7597      name = struct.GetBarreName(barre) 
7598      l = struct.GetLength(barre) 
7599      if l is None: 
7600        return ("Non disponible", 0) 
7601      if l < crit: 
7602        l = 0 
7603      s = struct.GetSection(barre) 
7604      if s is None: 
7605        return ("Non disponible", 0) 
7606      if s < crit/1e4: 
7607        s = 0 
7608      i = struct.GetMQua(barre) 
7609      if i is None: 
7610        return ("Non disponible", 0) 
7611      if i < crit/1e8: 
7612        i = 0 
7613      a = struct.GetAngle(barre) 
7614      if a is None: 
7615        return ("Non disponible", 0) 
7616      if abs(a) < crit: 
7617        a = 0 
7618      text = "%s : l = %s %s, S = %s %s, Igz = %s %s, Angle = %s°" % (name, 
7619                  function.PrintValue(l, struct.units['L']), unit_L, 
7620                  function.PrintValue(s, struct.units['S']), unit_S, 
7621                  function.PrintValue(i, struct.units['I']), unit_I, 
7622                  function.PrintValue(a)) 
7623      return (text, 2) 

7624   

7625 -  def _area_node_info(self, noeud, drawing): 

7626      """Retourne les informations sur le noeud choisi""" 
7627      #crit = 1e-10 
7628      study = self.studies[drawing.id_study] 
7629      rdm = study.rdm 
7630      struct = rdm.struct 
7631      crit = max(struct.width, struct.height)/1e8 
7632      try: 
7633        x = struct.Nodes[noeud.name][0] 
7634      except KeyError: 
7635        x = struct.NodeNotLinked[noeud.name][0] 
7636      if abs(x) < crit: 
7637        x = 0 
7638      try: 
7639        y = struct.Nodes[noeud.name][1] 
7640      except KeyError: 
7641        y = struct.NodeNotLinked[noeud.name][1] 
7642      if abs(y) < crit: 
7643        y = 0 
7644      unit_L = study.get_unit_name('L') 
7645      text = "%s : %s %s, %s %s" % (noeud.name, 
7646          function.PrintValue(x, rdm.struct.units['L']), unit_L, 
7647          function.PrintValue(y, rdm.struct.units['L']), unit_L) 
7648      return (text, 2)

7712 -  def get_message(self):

7716      if is_selected is False:

7733 -  def get_char_message(self, rdm, n): 

7734      """Retourne le message concernant le chargement actif""" 
7735      if n is None: 
7736        return None 
7737      name = rdm.GetCharNameByNumber(n) 
7738      n_cases = rdm.n_cases 
7739      if n < n_cases: 
7740        return ("Cas: %s" % name, 3) 
7741      coefs = rdm.CombiCoef 
7742      cas = coefs[name] 
7743      li = cas.keys() 
7744      li.sort() 
7745      string = '' 
7746      for val in li: 
7747        coef = cas[val] 
7748        if float(coef) == 0.: 
7749          continue 
7750        string += ' %sx%s +' % (coef, val) 
7751      string = string[:-1] 
7752      return ("Combinaison: %s (%s)" % (name, string), 3)

7868 -  def motion_notify_action(self, area, event, is_press):

7872        x, y, state = event.window.get_pointer() 
7873      else: 
7874        # for Windows 
7875        x = event.x 
7876        y = event.y 
7877        state = event.state 
7878      if is_press: 
7879        x0, y0 = is_press 
7880        dx = x-x0 
7881        dy = y-y0 
7882        cr = self.cr 
7883        if not self.is_selected: 
7884          return

7886          return

7888          return

7892          self.new_surface(self.area_w, self.area_h) 
7893          cr = self.cr 
7894          x, y, w, h = self.mapping.infos[drawing.id][info_id].box

7896          self._paint_moving_info(cr, drawing, info_id, dx, dy, 0.5) 
7897          rect = gtk.gdk.Rectangle(int(min(x+dx, x+dx_prec))-5, int(min(y+dy_prec, y+dy))-5, int(max(w, w+dx_prec-dx))+10, int(max(h, h+dy_prec-dy))+10)

7899          self.expose_event(area, rect) 
7900        elif self.is_selected[0] == 'value':

7902          barre = legend.name 
7903          u = legend.u 
7904          status = drawing.status 
7905          drawing.user_values.setdefault(status, {})

7909          dy = float(legend.y - y)

7911          try: 
7912            di = moved[u] 
7913            if legend.disc in di: 
7914              coors = di[legend.disc] 
7915              di[legend.disc] = (coors[0]+dx, coors[1]+dy, False) 
7916            else: 
7917              di[legend.disc] = (dx, dy, False) 
7918          except KeyError: 
7919            moved[u] = {legend.disc: (dx, dy)}

7936          self._paint_moving_struct(cr, drawing, dx, dy, 0.5)

7940            for elem in drawing.mapping.infos[drawing.id].values(): 
7941              xi, yi, wi, hi = elem.box 
7942              xm = min(xi, x) 
7943              ym = min(yi, y) 
7944              w = max(x+w, xi+wi)-xm 
7945              h = max(y+h, yi+hi)-ym 
7946              x, y = xm, ym

7956 -  def finish_dnd(self, event, is_press): 

7957      """Actions liées à la fin du drag and drop dans le area""" 
7958      #print "finish_dnd" 
7959      if not self.is_selected: 
7960        return 
7961      if not is_press: 
7962        return 
7963      cr = self.cr 
7964      x0, y0 = is_press 
7965      x1, y1 = event.x, event.y 
7966      dx = x1-x0 
7967      dy = y1-y0 
7968      dx, dy = int(dx), int(dy) 
7969      if not dx and not dy: 
7970        return 
7971      # on encre la légende 
7972      if self.is_selected[0] == 'info': 
7973        drawing = self.is_selected[1] 
7974        info_id = self.is_selected[2] 
7975        x, y, w, h = self.mapping.infos[drawing.id][info_id].box 
7976        x = x + dx 
7977        y = y + dy 
7978        self.mapping.set_moved_info(drawing.id, info_id, (x, y, w, h)) 
7979        self.del_surface() 
7980        drawing.del_patterns() 
7981        w_min, h_min = x + w, y + h 
7982        is_resize = False 
7983        if w_min > self.area_w and dx > 0: 
7984          self.area_w = int(x + w) 
7985          is_resize = True 
7986        if h_min > self.area_h and dy > 0: 
7987          self.area_h = int(y + h) 
7988          is_resize = True 
7989        if is_resize: 
7990          self.area.set_size_request(self.area_w, self.area_h) 
7991        else: 
7992          self.configure_event(self.area) 
7993          self.area.queue_draw() 
7994      elif self.is_selected[0] == 'value': 
7995        drawing, n_case, legend = self.is_selected[1:] 
7996        x, y = legend.x, legend.y 
7997        w, h = 25, 8 # il faudrait revoir entièrement les dimensions de la box pour pouvoir en réduire aussi la taille 
7998        self.mapping.extend_box(drawing.id, x-w, y-h) 
7999        self.mapping.extend_box(drawing.id, x+w, y+h) 
8000      elif self.is_selected[0] == 'draw': 
8001        drawing = self.is_selected[1] 
8002        b_x, b_y, b_w, b_h = self.mapping.box[drawing.id] 
8003        w_min = b_x + b_w + dx 
8004        h_min = b_y + b_h + dy 
8005        drawing.x0 += dx 
8006        drawing.y0 += dy 
8007        if drawing.id in drawing.mapping.infos: 
8008          for elem in drawing.mapping.infos[drawing.id].values(): 
8009            x, y, w, h = elem.box 
8010            x += dx 
8011            y += dy 
8012            elem.box = (x, y, w, h) 
8013  # modif 20/3 
8014        #self.del_surface() 
8015        drawing.del_patterns() 
8016        is_resize = False 
8017        # ne réduit jamais la taille de l'area 
8018        if w_min > self.area_w and dx > 0: 
8019          self.area_w += dx 
8020          is_resize = True 
8021        if h_min > self.area_h and dy > 0: 
8022          self.area_h += dy 
8023          is_resize = True 
8024        if is_resize: 
8025          self.del_surface() 
8026          self.area.set_size_request(self.area_w, self.area_h) 
8027        else: 
8028          rect = drawing.mapping.box[drawing.id] 
8029          self.configure_event(self.area, rect) 
8030          self.area.queue_draw() 
8031        self.remove_tools_box() 
8032        self._draw_tools(drawing) 
8033      watch = gtk.gdk.Cursor(gtk.gdk.HAND2) 
8034      self.area.window.set_cursor(watch)

8069 -  def on_pos_change(self, widget, event, n_case, legend): 

8070      """Evènement sur l'Entry de modification de la position d'une légende""" 
8071      exit = False 
8072      must_save = False 
8073      if event.type == gtk.gdk.EXPOSE: 
8074        text = widget.get_text() 
8075        layout = widget.get_layout() 
8076        w, h = layout.get_pixel_size() 
8077        w0, h0 = widget.size_request() 
8078        if not w + 20 == w0: 
8079          widget.set_size_request(w+20, h) 
8080      elif event.type == gtk.gdk.KEY_PRESS: 
8081        drawing = self.is_selected[1] 
8082        key = gtk.gdk.keyval_name (event.keyval) 
8083        if key == "Return": 
8084          try: 
8085            u = float(widget.get_text()) 
8086            must_save = True 
8087          except ValueError: 
8088            pass 
8089          exit = True 
8090        elif key == "Escape": 
8091          exit = True 
8092      elif event.type == gtk.gdk.DESTROY: 
8093        drawing = self.is_selected[1] 
8094        try: 
8095          u = float(widget.get_text()) 
8096          must_save = True 
8097        except ValueError: 
8098          pass 
8099        exit = True 
8100      if must_save: 
8101          if abs(u - legend.u) > 1e-8: 
8102            #print "%.12f %.12f" % (u, legend.u) 
8103            resu = drawing._get_user_value(n_case, legend.name, legend.u, legend.disc, True) 
8104            if resu: 
8105              di, pos = resu 
8106              tu = di[pos][legend.disc] 
8107              del(di[pos][legend.disc]) 
8108              if len(di[pos]) == 0: 
8109                del(di[pos]) 
8110              di[u] = {0: tu} 
8111            else: 
8112              drawing._set_user_values(n_case, legend.name, u, legend.disc, 0, 0) 
8113   
8114   
8115   
8116      if exit: 
8117        self.del_surface() 
8118        drawing.del_patterns() 
8119        self.remove_tools_box() 
8120        self.remove_entry_box() 
8121        self.is_selected = ('draw', drawing) 
8122        self.configure_event(self.area) 
8123        self.area.queue_draw() 

8124   
8125

8164 -  def on_scale_change(self, widget, event, tag): 

8165      """Gère les événement clavier pour le menu de l'echelle""" 
8166      if event.type == gtk.gdk.EXPOSE: 
8167        text = widget.get_text() 
8168        layout = widget.get_layout() 
8169        w, h = layout.get_pixel_size() 
8170        w0, h0 = widget.size_request() 
8171        if not w + 20 == w0: 
8172          widget.set_size_request(w+20, h) 
8173      elif event.type == gtk.gdk.KEY_PRESS: 
8174        drawing = self.is_selected[1] 
8175        study = self.studies[drawing.id_study] 
8176        key = gtk.gdk.keyval_name (event.keyval) 
8177        text = widget.get_text().replace(',', '.') 
8178        if key == "Return": 
8179          try: 
8180            value = float(text) 
8181          except ValueError: 
8182            value = None 
8183          if not value is None: 
8184            if tag == "struct": 
8185              if drawing.get_max_scale(value, study): 
8186                scale = drawing.struct_scale*drawing.struct_zoom 
8187                coef = value/scale 
8188                self.del_surface() 
8189                drawing.del_patterns() 
8190                self._resize_drawing(study, drawing, coef) 
8191              else: 
8192                print "debug::on_scale_change taille maxi" 
8193            elif tag == "chart": 
8194              if drawing.get_max_scale2(value, study): 
8195                scale = drawing.chart_scale*drawing.chart_zoom 
8196                coef = value/scale 
8197                drawing.chart_zoom *= coef 
8198                self.del_surface() 
8199                drawing.del_patterns() 
8200                self.configure_event(self.area) 
8201                self.area.queue_draw() 
8202            elif tag == "pos": 
8203              if value >= 0. and value <= 1.: 
8204                drawing.u = value 
8205                self.del_surface() 
8206                drawing.del_patterns() 
8207                self.configure_event(self.area) 
8208                self.area.queue_draw() 
8209          self.remove_tools_box() 
8210          self.remove_entry_box() 
8211          self.is_selected = ('draw', drawing) 
8212        elif key == "Escape": 
8213          self.remove_tools_box() 
8214          self.remove_entry_box() 
8215          self.is_selected = ('draw', drawing)

8376 -  def draw_svg_file(self, file): 

8377      """Lance le tracé du graphe en fonction de la valeur de status 
8378      Attention, tous les éléments dessinés à partir d'un patern sont dessinés en bitmap""" 
8379      surface = cairo.SVGSurface(file, self.area_w, self.area_h) 
8380      cr = cairo.Context(surface) 
8381      drawings = self.drawings 
8382      studies = self.studies 
8383   
8384      for drawing in drawings.values(): 
8385        study = studies[drawing.id_study] 
8386        drawing.del_patterns() # force un nouveau tracé pour éviter d'avoir des images bitmap de certain pattern 
8387        drawing.expose_drawing(cr, study) 
8388        while gtk.events_pending(): 
8389            gtk.main_iteration(False) 
8390        self._main.window.queue_draw() 
8391        drawing.paint_drawing(cr) 
8392   
8393      surface.finish() 

8394   

8395 -  def draw_png_file(self, file): 

8396      """Lance le tracé du graphe en fonction de la valeur de status 
8397      Attention, tous les éléments dessinés à partir d'un patern sont dessinés en bitmap""" 
8398      surface = cairo.ImageSurface(cairo.FORMAT_RGB24, self.area_w, self.area_h) 
8399      cr = cairo.Context(surface) 
8400      self.draw_surface_bg(cr) 
8401      drawings = self.drawings 
8402      studies = self.studies 
8403   
8404      for drawing in drawings.values(): 
8405        study = studies[drawing.id_study] 
8406        drawing.expose_drawing(cr, study) 
8407        while gtk.events_pending(): 
8408            gtk.main_iteration(False) 
8409        self._main.window.queue_draw() 
8410        drawing.paint_drawing(cr) 
8411   
8412      surface.write_to_png(file) 
8413      surface.finish()

8415 -  def area_zoom_moins(self, study, drawing):

8418      if not hasattr(study, "rdm"): 
8419        return False 
8420      self.del_surface() 
8421      drawing.del_patterns()

8423   

8424 -  def get_drawings_size(self): 

8425      """Retourne la boite contenant l'ensemble des drawings""" 
8426      for i, box in enumerate(self.mapping.box.values()): 
8427        x, y, w, h = box 
8428        if i == 0: 
8429          x0, y0, x1, y1 = x, y, x+w, y+h 
8430        if x < x0: 
8431          x0 = x 
8432        if x+w > x1: 
8433          x1 = x+w 
8434        if y < y0: 
8435          y0 = y 
8436        if y+h > y1: 
8437          y1 = y+h 
8438      w = x1 - x0 
8439      h = y1 - y0 
8440      return x0, y0, w, h

8443 -  def area_zoom_best(self, study): 

8444      """Redimensionne la surface à la taille par défaut""" 
8445      #print "classDrawing::area_zoom_best" 
8446      if not hasattr(study, "rdm"): 
8447        return False 
8448      cr = self.cr 
8449      drawings = self.drawings 
8450      x0, y0, w, h = self.get_drawings_size() 
8451      x1, y1 = x0+w, y0+h 
8452      for drawing in drawings.values(): 
8453        drawing.x0 -= x0 
8454        drawing.y0 -= y0 
8455        drawing.del_patterns() 
8456   
8457      area_w, area_h = self.area.size_request() 
8458      sw = self.sw 
8459      sw_w = int(sw.get_hadjustment().page_size) 
8460      sw_h = int(sw.get_vadjustment().page_size) 
8461      # ne doit pas être inférieur à sw 
8462      if w < sw_w: 
8463        w = sw_w 
8464      if h < sw_h: 
8465        h = sw_h 
8466      self.del_surface() 
8467      if w == area_w and h == area_h: 
8468        self.configure_event(self.area) 
8469        self.area.queue_draw() 
8470      else: 
8471        self.area.set_size_request(w, h)

8473 -  def area_zoom_plus(self, study, drawing): 

8474      """Agrandit la taille du drawing_area""" 
8475      #print "classDrawing::area_zoom_plus" 
8476       
8477      if not hasattr(study, "rdm"): 
8478        return False 
8479      if max(self.area_w, self.area_h) >= 2000: 
8480        return False 
8481      self.del_surface() 
8482      drawing.del_patterns() 
8483      self._resize_drawing(study, drawing, 1./0.9)

8491 -  def _get_max_fp(self, rdm): # inutilisée si toutes les forces fp ont meme longueur 

8492      """recherche de la charge fp maxi 
8493      Retourne la norme""" 
8494      fpmax = 0 
8495      for barre in rdm.struct.Barres: 
8496        if not barre in rdm.charBarFp: 
8497          continue 
8498        dichar = rdm.charBarFp[barre] 
8499        for alpha, char in dichar.items(): 
8500          fpu = char[0] 
8501          fpv = char[1] 
8502          fp = (fpu**2 + fpv**2)**0.5 
8503          if fp > fpmax: 
8504            fpmax = fp 
8505      return fpmax 
8506

8508   
8509   
8510  # inutilisée 

8511 -  def _pix_opacify(self, cr, w, h): 

8512      """Dessine un rectangle blanc semi-transparent sur la pixmap""" 
8513      cr.save() 
8514      cr.set_source_rgba(1, 1, 1, 0.8) 
8515      cr.rectangle(0, 0, w, h) 
8516      cr.fill() 
8517      cr.stroke() 
8518      cr.restore()

8522 -  def draw_surface_bg(self, cr=None): 

8523      """initialise un fond blanc dans la surface""" 
8524      if cr is None: 
8525        cr = self.cr 
8526      cr.save() 
8527      self._fg.set_color_by_name(cr, "white") 
8528      cr.rectangle(0, 0, self.area_w, self.area_h) 
8529      cr.fill() 
8530      #cr.stroke() 
8531      cr.restore()
